30a2('bum): pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba che dbang po rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam stobs la
30a3('bum): dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ stobs rnam mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam byang chub kyi yan lag la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe// 
30a4('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgya nga pal dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i
30a5('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam 'phags pa'i bden pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe// 
30a6('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam bsam gtan rnams la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ bsam gtan rnams mthong ba
30a7('bum): med pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam tshad med pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ tshad med pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam gzugs med pa'i snyoms
30a8('bum): par 'jug pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam rnam par thar pa brgyad la/ 
30b1('bum): dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa brgyad mthong ba med de phyir ston pa'o// nam mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la dmigs pa'i
30b2('bum): rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
30b3('bum): pa dang / smon pa med pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o// 
30b4('bum): nam mngon par shes pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nab ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pa'i rnam par
30b5('bum): shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam gzungs kyi sgo la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ gzungs
30b6('bum): kyi sgo rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mthong ba
30b7('bum): med pa'i phyir sten pa'o// napa mi 'jigs pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ mi 'jigs pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir/ ston pa'o// nam so so yang dag par
30b8('bum): rig pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam snying rje chen po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa ma
31a1('bum): 'byung ba'i tshe/ snying rje chen po mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o// ram sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba
31a2('bum): tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o// rnam rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rgyun tu zhugs
31a3('bum): pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba med
31a4('bum): pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dmig sa pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam dgra bcom
31a5('bum): pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes ye 'byung ba'i tshe/ dgra bcom pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam rang byang chub la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa ma
31a6('bum): 'byung ba'i tshe/ rang byang chub mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o// nam lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
31a7('bum): mthong ba med pa'i phyir sten pa'o// nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir
31a8('bum): ston pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing ston pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin
31b1('bum): gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten du stong pa zhes rjod de/ 'jig rten du ci stong pa zhes brjod ce na/ gzu
31b2('bum): stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// 'du shes stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// 'du byed stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten
31b3('bum): du rjod do// rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya ba 'jig rten du rjod do// mig stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rna ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// sna stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig
31b4('bum): rten du rjod do// lce stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// lus stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// yid stong zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjong ngo do// gzugs stong ngo zhes
31b5('bum): bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// sgra stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// dri stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// ro stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// reg stong ngo zhes
31b6('bum): bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// chos stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// mig gi rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar
31b7('bum): 'jig rten du rjod do// sna'i rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// lce'i rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong
31b8('bum): zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjong do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjong ngo do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg
32a1('bum): pa stang ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod ngo do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten
32a2('bum): du rjod do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
32a3('bum): tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba spong ngo zhes
32a4('bum): bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rgyu na gyis tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod de/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong ngo zhes
32a5('bum): bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyu na gyis tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// sa'i khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// 
32a6('bum): chu'i khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// me'i khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rlung gi khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// 
32a7('bum): nam mkha'i khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rnam par shes pa'i khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// ma rig pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// 
32a8('bum): 'du byed stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// ming dang gzugs stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// skye mched
32b1('bum): drug stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// sred pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig
32b2('bum): rten du rjod do// len pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// srid pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// skye ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rga shi stong ngo zhes
32b3('bum): bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ 
32b4('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
32b5('bum): pasdong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod ngo // nang stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// 
32b6('bum): phyi stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong do zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// chen
32b7('bum): po stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// 'dus ma
32b8('bum): byas stong pa nyid stong 'i bya 'ji rjod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// 
33a1('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjong ngo // rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong ngo zhem
33a2('bum): bya bar 'jig rten du rjong ngo do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid steng nga zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjong ngo // dngos pa ma
33a3('bum): stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// 
33a4('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig / na du rjongad ngo do// yang dag par spong ba rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sto
33a5('bum): zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// dbang po rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// stobs rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// byang
33a6('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjong do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong
33a7('bum): zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// bsam gtan rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// tshad med pa rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjong ngo // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'dus
33a8('bum): ba rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjong ngo do// rnam par thar pa brgyad stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du
33b1('bum): rjod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// mngon par shes pa rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten
33b2('bum): du rjod de// ting nge 'dzin rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong ngo zhes bya bar
33b3('bum): 'jig rten du rjod do// mi 'jigs pa bzhi stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// byams pa chen po stong ngo zhes
33b4('bum): bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// snying rje chen po stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rgyun tu
33b5('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong ngo zhes
33b6('bum): bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// dgra bcom pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rang byang chub stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar
33b7('bum): 'jig rten du rjod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do// rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig
33b8('bum): rten ston pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten stong ngo zhes bya bar ston/ 'jig rten stong zhes bya bar rjod do// 'jig rten na stong
34a1('bum): zhes bya bar shes par byed do// rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang shes
34a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten stong zhes bya bar ston te/ 'jig rten stong zhes bya bar ji ltar ston ce na/ 'jig rten na gzugs stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig
34a3('bum): rten na tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na 'du shes stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na 'du byed stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar
34a4('bum): ston to// 'jig rten na mig stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'ji ga rten na rna ba stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na sA stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na lce stong zhes bya
34a5('bum): bar ston to// 'jig rten na lus stong zhes bya bar ston to// / 'jig rten na yid stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jagarten na gzugs stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten
34a6('bum): na sgra stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na dri stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na ro stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na reg stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na chos stong
34a7('bum): zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na mig gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na sna'i rnam par
34a8('bum): shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na lce'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na yid
34b1('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar sten to// 'jig rten na mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar stong ngo to// 'jig rten na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten
34b2('bum): na sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten
34b3('bum): na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong ne bar ston to// 'jig rten rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya
34b4('bum): bar ston to// 'jig rten na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar
34b5('bum): ston to// 'jig rten na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston
34b6('bum): tor 'jig rten na sa'i khams stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na chu'i khams stong zhes bya bar sten to// rigar na me'i khams stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na rlung gi khams
34b7('bum): stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na na mkha'i khams stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na rnam par shes pa'i khams stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na ma rig pa stong zhe
34b8('bum): bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na 'du byed stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na ming dang gzugs stong zhes bya bar ston to// 
35a1('bum): 'jig rten na skye mched drug sdong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na reg pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na tshor ba stong zhes bya bar sngon te// 'jig rten na sred pa
35a2('bum): stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na len pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'dzag rten na srid pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na skye ba steng zhes bya bar stod to// 'jig rten na rga shi stong
35a3('bum): zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa steng zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na bzod pa
35a4('bum): phyin pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya

35a7('bum): rten na don dam pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig
35a8('bum): rten na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/  da ga ma med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar
35b1('bum): ston to// 'jig rten na rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid

36a1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na mngon par shes pa rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten na

36a8('bum): bskyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// dam de zhes ba
36b1('bum): thab pa/ rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston te/ ji ltar 'jig rten

39b1('bum): shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to// rab 'byor gzhan yang
39b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// 'jig rten ji ltar dben zhes bya bar ston ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten

40a2('bum): zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rte/ 
40a3('bum): dben zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i

40a6('bum): gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya
40a7('bum): bar ston to// chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// me'i khams kyi 'jig rten dad rje bya bar ston to// rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// na mkha'i
40a8('bum): khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// ma rig pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// 'du byed kyi
40b1('bum): 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// ming dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// skye mched drug gi 'jig
40b2('bum): rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// tsher ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// sred pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// len pa'i
40b3('bum): 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// srid pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// skye ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rga shi'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// 
40b4('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// bzod pa'i pha rol tu
40b5('bum): phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// brtson 'a grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya ba ra ston to// bas gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten
40b6('bum): dben zhes bya bar ston to// shA rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya
40b7('bum): bar ston to// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes
40b8('bum): bya bar ston to// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig
41a1('bum): / rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes
41a2('bum): bya bar ston to// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig tu
41a3('bum): dben zhes bya bar ston to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// dngos po med pa stong
41a4('bum): pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// ngo bo nyid sto/ nga ba nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid sa kyi na dben zhes bya bar
41a5('bum): ston to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten den / ston to// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi
41a6('bum): 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
41a7('bum): kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar
41a8('bum): ston to// bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// tshad med pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
41b1('bum): kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten dben zhes
41b2('bum): bya bar ston to// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dpa
41b3('bum): zhes bya bar ston to// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
41b4('bum): stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya ba ra ston to// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'jig rten
41b5('bum): dben zhes bya bar ston to// byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// snying rje chen po'i 'ja garten dben zhes bya bar ston to// sangs rgyas kyi
41b6('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dben zhes ston to// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'ji
41b7('bum): rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rang byang chub
41b8('bum): kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben
42a1('bum): bya bar ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston sa/ rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
42a2('bum): pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// ji ltar 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston ce na// gzugs kyi 'jig
42a3('bum): rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'du shes kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes

42a5('bum): gi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes/ bya bar ston to// sna'i 'jig rten mtha' las pa stong pa
42a6('bum): zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i 'jig rten mtha' yas 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las

45a3('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// / 
45a4('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten mtha 'a las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lam gyi rnam
45a5('bum): pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya
45a6('bum): bar ston to// rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// ji ltar 'jig rten ngo bo nyid kyis stong
45a7('bum): pa zhes bya bar ston ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'du shes kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong

45b1('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes

45b7('bum): bya bar ston to// mig gi 'dus te rig pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te

46a6('bum): ston to// nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba ston to// ma rig pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo
46a7('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// ming dang gzugs
46a8('bum): kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// skye mched drug gi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston te/ 
46b1('bum): tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// sred pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// len pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston te/ 
46b2('bum): srid pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// skye ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rga shi'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston
46b3('bum): toHsbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong po zhes bya bar ston to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 
46b4('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
46b5('bum): ston to// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rte/ na ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ajig rten
46b6('bum): bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston po// nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
46b7('bum): ston to// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// chen po stong pa nyid kyi
46b8('bum): 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
47a1('bum): bya bar ston to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
47a2('bum): to/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar stong to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
47a3('bum): kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
47a4('bum): bya bar ston to// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// ngo bo nyid stong
47a5('bum): nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dngos bo med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
47a6('bum): kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid steng ba
47a7('bum): zhes bya bar ston to// dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig

47b2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
47b3('bum): 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar

47b6('bum): kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'jig te/ ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba

52a1('bum): / 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar sten to// reg gi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// chos kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes
52a2('bum): bya bar ston to// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston te// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya
52a3('bum): bar ston to// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten na
52a4('bum): zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhe
52a5('bum): bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// mig gi 'dus te reg pa
52a6('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba 'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
52a7('bum): 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston
52a8('bum): to/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// 
52b1('bum): me'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rlung gyi khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten ni zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i kham
52b2('bum): kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// ma rig pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// 
52b3('bum): ming dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya ba ston to// skye mched drug gi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar
52b4('bum): ston to// sred pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// na pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// srid pa'i 'ja garten ni zhes bya bar ston to// skye ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya
52b5('bum): bar ston to// rga shi'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig
52b6('bum): rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// bsam gtan
52b7('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston
52b8('bum): to// phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// 
53a1('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig
53a2('bum): rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// thog ma dang
53a3('bum): tha ma med pa stong ba nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// chos
53a4('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig
53a5('bum): rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// dngos po med
53a6('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar
53a7('bum): ston to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// byang
53a8('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi
53b1('bum): 'jig rten ni zhes bya bar ston to// bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// tshad med pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// gzugs med pa'i snyoms
53b2('bum): par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i
53b3('bum): 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// mngon par shes rnams kyi
53b4('bum): 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// ting 'dzi rnams kyi 'jig rta/ na zhi zhes bya bar ston to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'a jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
53b5('bum): stobs bcu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// mi 'jig sa pa bzhi'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya
53b6('bum): bya bar ston to// byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig
53b7('bum): rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// phyir mi 'ong
53b8('bum): ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// lam gyi rnam pa she
54a1('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
54a2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston to// rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar sten to// 
54a3('bum): ji ltar 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// tsher ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// 'du shes kyi
54a4('bum): 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rnam par she sa pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// 
54a5('bum): mig gi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// sna'i 'ji garten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// lce'i 'jig
54a6('bum): rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// gzugs kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya
54a7('bum): bar ston to// sgra'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// dri'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// ro'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// reg gi 'jig rten
54a8('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// chos kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rna ba'i rnam par
54b1('bum): shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces
54b2('bum): bya bar ston to// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya ba ston to// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
54b3('bum): 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// 
54b4('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya ba ra ston to// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten snang ba da ces bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig
54b5('bum): rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
54b6('bum): tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
54b7('bum): tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'dus te reg rkyen gyis tshor
54b8('bum): ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// me'i kham
55a1('bum): kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa
55a2('bum): nyid ces bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// ma rig pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten
55a3('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// ming dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// skye mched drug gi/ 
55a4('bum): 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// tshor ba'i 'jig rte/ na stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// sred pa'i 'jig rten
55a5('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// len pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// srid pa'i 'jig rten stong / pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// skye ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid
55a6('bum): ces bya bar ston to// rga shi'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
55a7('bum): ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa
55a8('bum): nyid ces bya bar ston to// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar
55b1('bum): ston to// nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces
55b2('bum): bya bar ston to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig
55b3('bum): rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// 
55b4('bum): mtha' la ba 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong / pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// 
55b5('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar sto/ na to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ce sa bya bar ston to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig
55b6('bum): rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston
55b7('bum): to dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
55b8('bum): kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid
56a1('bum): ces bya bar ston to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar snga
56a2('bum): to// stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
56a3('bum): brgyad pa'i 'dzag stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa
56a4('bum): nyid ces bya bar ston to// tshad med pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// gzugs med pa 'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong
56a5('bum): nyid ces bya bar ston to// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten stong
56a6('bum): nyid ces bya bar ston to// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi
56a7('bum): 'dzag rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// 
56a8('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i
56b1('bum): 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston po// byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// sangs rgyas kyi
56b2('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
56b3('bum): bu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar
56b4('bum): ston to// rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya ba ra ston to// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rnam pa thams cad
56b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston/ to// rab 'byor de ltar na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing // 'jig
56b6('bum): rten ston pa'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// dang pa rnaMs bslang du gcig pa/ 
56b7('bum): rab 'byor shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i 'jig rten ji ltar ston ce na/ ji nas kyang 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shesu yang mi 'gyur la/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes
56b8('bum): mi 'gyur ba'i chos de ltar ston to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gis 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes su 'gyur ba 'am/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shesu 'gyur ba'i chos
57a1('bum): de lta bu med do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i slad du nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab
57a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu ma mchis pa'i slad du nye
57a3('bum): bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don gzhal du ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
57a4('bum): 'di ni don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi
57a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar
57a6('bum): gnas so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don gzhal
57a7('bum): du med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor ji ltar
57a8('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
57b1('bum): ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don chen po ste/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad bskyab pa'i don dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtang ba'i don to// rab 'byor rnam
57b2('bum): grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab
57b3('bum): 'byor ji ltar na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid
57b4('bum): dang rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ rab 'byor rnam grang des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa
57b5('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor ji ltar na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don
57b6('bum): dpag tu med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor sems can du bsdu bas bsdus pal gang gis sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid
57b7('bum): dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag par nus pa de lta bu gang yang med de/ rab 'byor rnam grang des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa
57b8('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don dpag tu med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor ji ltar na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don gzhal
58a1('bum): du med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
58a2('bum): gzhal du med de/ sus kyang gzhal bar mi nus so// rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
58a3('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don gzhal du med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor ji ltar na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas
58a4('bum): pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mnyam pas mnyam pa yang su'ang med na lhag pa lta ji smos te/ 
58a5('bum): rab 'byor rnam grangs des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don
58a6('bum): mnyam dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen
58a7('bum): pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhi
58a8('bum): no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// rab 'byor sangs rgyas
58b1('bum): nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dpag tu med gzhal du med de/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor gzugs kyang bsam
58b2('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor tshor ba'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
58b3('bum): pa'o// rab 'byor 'du shes kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor 'du byed kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
58b4('bum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dang / ga tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
58b5('bum): pa'o// rab 'byor mig kyang bsam gyi mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa 'o// rab 'byor rna yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
58b6('bum): med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor sna yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor lce
58b7('bum): yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa sme/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor lus kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnya
58b8('bum): pa'o// rab 'byor yid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor gzugs kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
59a1('bum): med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor sgra yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
59a2('bum): pa'o/  rab 'byor dri yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzha' du medag rje mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor ro yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
59a3('bum): pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor reg kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor chos kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
59a4('bum): med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang bsam gyis mi khya ba dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang maH
59a5('bum): pa'o// rab 'byor rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang bas ma gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor sna'i rnam par
59a6('bum): shes pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
59a7('bum): du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab
59a8('bum): 'byor yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang bsam gyis mi
59b1('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
59b2('bum): pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg
59b3('bum): pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
59b4('bum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
59b5('bum): rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor
59b6('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
59b7('bum): tshor ba yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang bsam gyis mi
59b8('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
60a1('bum): med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnya
60a2('bum): pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor sa'i khams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor chu'i khams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab
60a3('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor me'i khams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// / 
60a4('bum): rab 'byor rlung gi khams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dang / ga tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nam mkha'i khams kyang bsam gyis mi
60a5('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
60a6('bum): med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor ma rig pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor 'du byed
60a7('bum): kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa
60a8('bum): ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor ming dang gzugs kyang bsam gyis khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor skye mched
60b1('bum): drug kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor reg pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ 
60b2('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor tshor ba yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor sred pa yang bsam gyis mi
60b3('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor len pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// 
60b4('bum): rab 'byor srid pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu me da gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor skye ba yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
60b5('bum): du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor/ rga shi yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med ga/ zhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// 
60b6('bum): rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi rol tu phyin pa yang
60b7('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
60b8('bum): du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// 
61a1('bum): rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang bsam gyis mi khya ba dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ ma mnyam pa dang mnyam pal// rab 'bya shes
61a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
61a3('bum): med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor phyin
61a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med ga/ zhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis ma
61a5('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa nga nga mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ 
61a6('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor 'dus byas
61a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
61a8('bum): med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnya
61b1('bum): ba dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor
61b2('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bsam
61b3('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa
61b4('bum): ste mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab da ngag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
61b5('bum): pa'o// rab 'byor mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang bas ma gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dngos po med
61b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyim mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
61b7('bum): meng gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi
61b8('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'a
62a1('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du bang ba ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
62a2('bum): kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dbang po rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ 
62a3('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor stobs rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag
62a4('bum): rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor 'a phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang bsam gyis
62a5('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa na/ mas kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
62a6('bum): med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor tshad med pa
62a7('bum): rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang bsam gyis mi
62a8('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang
62b1('bum): mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dbu yang bamar gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rnam par thar
62b2('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor mngon par shes
62b3('bum): pa rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
62b4('bum): med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor ga/ zungs kyi sgo rnams kyang bsam gyi mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor pa
62b5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi
62b6('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
62b7('bum): med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor byams pa chen po yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor snying rje
62b8('bum): chen po yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab
63a1('bum): // dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi ma
63a2('bum): pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
63a3('bum): yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
63a4('bum): pa'o// rab 'byor rang byang chub kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang
63a5('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rnam pa thams cang mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
63a6('bum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor chos
63a7('bum): thams cad kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni sems mi dmigs so// sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
63a8('bum): du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med dganas du ba ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'du
63b1('bum): shes bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'du byed bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ 
63b2('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// 
63b3('bum): rab 'byor mig bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rna ba bsam gyis khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ 
63b4('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sna bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lnga
63b5('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yA mi dmig so// rab 'byor lus pas ma gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
63b6('bum): pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor yid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs bsam
63b7('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sgra bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang ma
63b8('bum): ba yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dri bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor ro bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
64a1('bum): tu gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor reg bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang
64a2('bum): mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor chos bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mig gi rnam par she
64a3('bum): pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam lnga mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
64a4('bum): med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// / rab 'byor sna'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
64a5('bum): pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lce'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// 
64a6('bum): rab 'byor lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor yid kyi rnam par shes pa
64a7('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
64a8('bum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang man
64b1('bum): ba yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lce'i 'dus
64b2('bum): te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
64b3('bum): med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang
64b4('bum): mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang
64b5('bum): mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rgya na gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med pa/ zhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi
64b6('bum): dmigs so// rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab
64b7('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg bI rkyen gyis tshor ba bas gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba
64b8('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
65a1('bum): tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sa'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ 
65a2('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chu'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
65a3('bum): me'i khams bsam gyis khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rlung gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
65a4('bum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor nam mkha'i khams bsam gyis khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa
65a5('bum): dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs
65a6('bum): so / rab 'byor ma rig pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'du byed bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
65a7('bum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
65a8('bum): yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor ming dang gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor skye mched drug
65b1('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa
65b2('bum): ste/ mi mnyam pa yang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor
65b3('bum): sred pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor len pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
65b4('bum): med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// / rab 'byor srid pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs
65b5('bum): so/  rab 'byor skye ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu me da gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ya nga mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rga shi bsam gyis mi khyab
65b6('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ 
65b7('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ 
65b8('bum): yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
66a1('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor bsam
66a2('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bas
66a3('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ 
66a4('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnas pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// 
66a5('bum): rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ya nga mi dmigs so// rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
66a6('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du ba dag ste mi mthabs
66a7('bum): mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'dus byas
66a8('bum): stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
66b1('bum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gnal du med pa ste/ me mnyam pa dang mnyam
66b2('bum): pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor dor
66b3('bum): ba med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
66b4('bum): med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid pas ma gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi
66b5('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang
66b6('bum): mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
66b7('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi
66b8('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi
67a1('bum): dmigs so// rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// rab
67a2('bum): 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bas
67a3('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dbang po rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ 
67a4('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor stobs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// 
67a5('bum): rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam
67a6('bum): yan lag brgyad pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
67a7('bum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang
67a8('bum): mi dmigs so// rab 'byor tshad med pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i snyoms
67b1('bum): bar 'jug pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab dngag tu med gzhal du med
67b2('bum): ba ste mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang
67b3('bum): mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang
67b4('bum): mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mngon par she/ sa pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// 
67b5('bum): rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dang / ga tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams bas
67b6('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
67b7('bum): gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
67b8('bum): pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor
68a1('bum): / byams pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
68a2('bum): tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi
68a3('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang
68a4('bum): mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi ma nyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor phyir
68a5('bum): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid bsam gyis
68a6('bum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor rang byang chub bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
68a7('bum): pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad
68a8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmig so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
68b1('bum): tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam
68b2('bum): dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'du shes bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i
68b3('bum): slad du 'du byed bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab
68b4('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mig bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du
68b5('bum): ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma ma chos gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnya
