68b6('bum): pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tum mchi gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
68b7('bum): tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / 
68b8('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad
69a1('bum): du gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sgra bsam gyis mi khyab
69a2('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dri bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa
69a3('bum): dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ro bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du reg pas
69a4('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags// ci'i slad du chos bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
69a5('bum): gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mig gi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchi
69a6('bum): shing ra mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
69a7('bum): mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
69a8('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsam
69b1('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
69b2('bum): gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mig gi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi
69b3('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi
69b4('bum): dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna'i 'dus te reg pa ba sam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs shing // 
69b5('bum): ci'i slad du lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab da pag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa legs/ ci'i slad du lus
69b6('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis
69b7('bum): mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab
69b8('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpas
70a1('bum): tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis
70a2('bum): mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab
70a3('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis
70a4('bum): mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags// ci'i slad du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bas
70a5('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing // mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags// ci'i slad du sa'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal
70a6('bum): du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mig ga lags/ ci'i slad du chu'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmig
70a7('bum): pa lags/ ci'i slad du me'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rlung gi khams bsam gyis
70a8('bum): mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du nam mkha'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
70b1('bum): mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
70b2('bum): ba mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ma rig pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'du byed
70b3('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
70b4('bum): gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du meng dang gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
70b5('bum): mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du skye mched drug bsam gyis mi khya ba dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam
70b6('bum): pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad
70b7('bum): tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sred pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
70b8('bum): gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du len pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi
71a1('bum): dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du srid pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang nyam pa med migs pa lags/ ci'i slad du skye ba
71a2('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rga shi bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du
71a3('bum): ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa da
71a4('bum): mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags// / 
71a5('bum): ci'i slad du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
71a6('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bsam gtan gyi pha rol
71a7('bum): tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab
71a8('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchi
71b1('bum): shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyi stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi
71b2('bum): dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyi nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad
71b3('bum): du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chen po stong pa nyid bas
71b4('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shi nga / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du don dam stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
71b5('bum): tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
71b6('bum): gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis
71b7('bum): shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa
71b8('bum): dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi
72a1('bum): dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dag tum ma ma 6/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad
72a2('bum): du rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chos thams cad stong pa nyid
72a3('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
72a4('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mi dmig sa pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
72a5('bum): gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu mar chis gzhal du ma
72a6('bum): mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa legs/ ci'i slad du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang
72a7('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi// 
72a8('bum): dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags
72b1('bum): tsa'i slad du yang dag par spong ba rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rdzu 'phrul
72b2('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dbang po rnams bsam gyis mi khyab
72b3('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du stobs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
72b4('bum): mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
72b5('bum): mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag pa rgyang pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du
72b6('bum): ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / 
72b7('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bsam gtan rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi
72b8('bum): dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshad med pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
73a1('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing // mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lag/ 
73a2('bum): ci'i slad du rnam par thar pa brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mthar gyis
73a3('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad
73a4('bum): du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs
73a5('bum): pa lags/ ci'i slad du mngon par shes pa rnams pas ma gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma ma chis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
73a6('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du ting nge 'dzin rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzungs kyi sgo/ 
73a7('bum): rnams bsam gyi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsam gyis mi khya/ 
73a8('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mi 'jigs pa bzhi bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis
73b1('bum): shing ngami mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi
73b2('bum): dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du byams pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du snying rje chen po
73b3('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab
73b4('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rgyun tu zhug sa pa'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
73b5('bum): gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi
73b6('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
73b7('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du dgra bcom pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang byang chub bsam gyis mi khya
73b8('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang minyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis
74a1('bum): shing mi mnyam pa dang pa mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / 
74a2('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ 
74a3('bum): 'bacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs la yang bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// 
74a4('bum): rab 'byor tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'du shes la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang mi
74a5('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'du byed la yang bas ma pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyapa mi dang gso// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang
74a6('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor mig pa yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rna ba la
74a7('bum): yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sna la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// / 
74a8('bum): rab 'byor lce la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor lus la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
74b1('bum): mi dmig so// rab 'byor yid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor gzugs la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad
74b2('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor sgra la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor dri la yang bsam pa
74b3('bum): dang dpag pa dang tshang ba dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor ro la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor
74b4('bum): reg la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang ma nyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor cho sa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam
74b5('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad da nga mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor rna ba'i
74b6('bum): rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor sna'i rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
74b7('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor lce'i rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor lus kyi rnam
74b8('bum): par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam
75a1('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor rna ba
75a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
75a3('bum): mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la yang bas
75a4('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yang ba sam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
75a5('bum): mi dmig so// rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi sa tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam ba dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus
75a6('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang / 
75a7('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
75a8('bum): so/ rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
75b1('bum): tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor sa'i khams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// 
75b2('bum): rab 'byor chu'i khams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor me'i khams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam dang ma
75b3('bum): mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor rlung gi khams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnya ba mi dmig so// rab 'byor na mkha'i khams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa
75b4('bum): dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'a byor rnam par shes pa'i khams la yang bsam pa dang dang ga pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab
75b5('bum): 'byor ma rig pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'du byed la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa
75b6('bum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor ming dang gzugs la yang bsam pa dang dpag
75b7('bum): pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor skye mched drug la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor reg pa la yang
75b8('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byo
76a1('bum): / sred pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / chad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor len pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / chad dang mnyam pa dang
76a2('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor srid pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor skye ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
76a3('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor rga shi la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
76a4('bum): la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang
76a5('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnye padang mi mnyanami dmig so// rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol/ 
76a6('bum): phyin pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang panyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang ma
76a7('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid
76a8('bum): la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
76b1('bum): mi dmigs so// rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dngag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang / dpag
76b2('bum): pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor don dam
76b3('bum): pa stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa
76b4('bum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong ba nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnya ma pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor mtha' las
76b5('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / da dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang
76b6('bum): dpag pa dang / tshangad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// 
76b7('bum): rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang
76b8('bum): dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmapa
77a1('bum): so/ rab 'byor mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor dngos po med pa stong
77a2('bum): pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang bsam baM dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
77a3('bum): mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor dran pa nye bar
77a4('bum): gzhag pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / cha da dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa
77a5('bum): dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
77a6('bum): mi dmig so// rab 'byor dbang po rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor stobs rnams la
77a7('bum): yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang
77a8('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'phags
77b1('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang
77b2('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor tshad med pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs
77b3('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor rnam par thar pa rnams la yang bsam pa
77b4('bum): dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'a drug pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad
77b5('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor rna ma par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med/ pa dang / smon pa med pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa
77b6('bum): dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab
77b7('bum): 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa
77b8('bum): dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
78a1('bum): dmig so// rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor so so yang dag par
78a2('bum): rig pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor byams pa chen po la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang
78a3('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor snying rje chen po la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
78a4('bum): la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
78a5('bum): mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang / mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor phyir mi
78a6('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam
78a7('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor rang byang chub la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la
78a8('bum): yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang
78b1('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshor ba la/ 
78b2('bum): bas pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'du shes la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags
78b3('bum): ci'i slad du 'du byed la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa
78b4('bum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mig la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba la bas
78b5('bum): ba dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du snal bsam par nga dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig
78b6('bum): pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
78b7('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang
78b8('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sgra la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dril bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad
79a1('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rol bsam pa dang dpag pa dang da da nye pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du reg pa la
79a2('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chos la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i
79a3('bum): slad du mig gi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la bas pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnya
79a4('bum): ba dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce'i
79a5('bum): rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i sla nga du lus kyi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
79a6('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid kyi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnye ba mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i
79a7('bum): slad du mig gi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnya
79a8('bum): ba dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ tsa'i slad du sna'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce
79b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la bas pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
79b2('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la bas pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mig gi 'dus te
79b3('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnye ba mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang
79b4('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig sa pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam
79b5('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
79b6('bum): pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid kyi 'dus te
79b7('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sa'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam
79b8('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chu'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang 'das pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du me'i khams la bsam
80a1('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnye ba dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rlung gi khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
80a2('bum): dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du na mkha'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa'i khams la bsam pa
80a3('bum): dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ma rig pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
80a4('bum): 'du byed la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
80a5('bum): ba mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ming dang gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du skye mched drug la
80a6('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshor
80a7('bum): ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sred pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags
80a8('bum): ci'i slad du len pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnya pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du srid pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
80b1('bum): dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du skye ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rga shi la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang
80b2('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lagaso// ci'i slad du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshul khrims
80b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang maH
80b4('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du brtson 'a/ grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang cha da dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i
80b5('bum): slad du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi da migs pa lags/ ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
80b6('bum): pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du nang stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
80b7('bum): dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyi stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyi nang stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag
80b8('bum): pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad stong ba nyid stong ba nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
81a1('bum): chen po stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du don dam pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad da
81a2('bum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'dus ma byas stong pa
81a3('bum): nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
81a4('bum): pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dor ba me
81a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
81a6('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
81a7('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang
81a8('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dngos po med pa stong pa nyid le bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i
81b1('bum): slad du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag
81b2('bum): ba dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
81b3('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du yang dag par spong ba rnams la bsam pa dang dngagad pa tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bsam
81b4('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dbang po rnams la bsam pa dang dang ga pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
81b5('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du stobs rnams la bsam pa dang dpag ba dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la
81b6('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
81b7('bum): pa mi dmigs/ ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bsam gtan rnams la bas
81b8('bum): ba dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chad med pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
82a1('bum): kha lags/ ci'i slad du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
82a2('bum): lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
82a3('bum): 'jug pa dgu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa
82a4('bum): med pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mngon par shes pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam
82a5('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ting nge 'a dzin rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
82a6('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / 
82a7('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mi 'jigs pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du so so yang dag par
82a8('bum): rig pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du byams pa chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
82b1('bum): pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du snying rje chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
82b2('bum): la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
82b3('bum): pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
82b4('bum): bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnya ma pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dgra bcom pa nyi da la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
82b5('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang byang chub la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
82b6('bum): mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
82b7('bum): nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
82b8('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor tshor ba'i
83a1('bum): nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
83a2('bum): mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'du shes kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'du shes la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad
83a3('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa da ma ste/ de'i phyir 'du byed la bsam pa dang
83a4('bum): dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig sa so// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang
83a5('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mig gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis
83a6('bum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mig la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rna ba'i ngo ba
83a7('bum): nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu meng gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rna ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// 
83a8('bum): rab 'byor sna'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sna la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
83b1('bum): mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lce'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi nya dang ga tu me gan du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
83b2('bum): dmigs so// rab 'byor lus kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lus la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa
83b3('bum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor yid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad
83b4('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor gzu gas kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzugs la
83b5('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sgra'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang ma
83b6('bum): pa ste/ de'i phyir sgra la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dri'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang
83b7('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dri la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor ro'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi
83b8('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ro la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor reg gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
84a1('bum): du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir reg la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis
84a2('bum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chos la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mig gi rnam par
84a3('bum): shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa
84a4('bum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir
84a5('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
84a6('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sna'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab
84a7('bum): 'byor lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / 
84a8('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i
84b1('bum): phyir lus kyi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
84b2('bum): med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mig gi
84b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang
84b4('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor rna ba'i la dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir na
84b5('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
84b6('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor lce'i
84b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam
84b8('bum): ba dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lus kyi
85a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
85a2('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// 
85a3('bum): rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
85a4('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid
85a5('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rna ba'i 'dus te/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / 
85a6('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang
85a7('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
85a8('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag
85b1('bum): ba dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
85b2('bum): ba ste/ de'i phyir lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnya pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
85b3('bum): tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang / 
85b4('bum): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor sa'i kha mas kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med ga zha la du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sa'i
85b5('bum): khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chu'i kha mas kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
85b6('bum): du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chu'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor me'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam
85b7('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir me'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab
85b8('bum): 'byor rlung gi khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rlung gyi khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang ma
86a1('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor na mkha'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
86a2('bum): ste/ de'i phyir na mkha'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi
86a3('bum): ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / chang dang mnyam pa dang mi
86a4('bum): mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor ma rig pa'i ngo bo nyid ba sam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam ba dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ma rig pa la bsam pa dang
86a5('bum): dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmi gso// rab 'byor 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khya ba dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
86a6('bum): ste de'i phyir 'du byed la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du
86a7('bum): med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor ming dang gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid
86a8('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ming dang gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
86b1('bum): dmigs// rab 'byor skye mched drug gang po nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir skye mched drug la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / 
86b2('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir reg pa la
86b3('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
86b4('bum): pa ste de'i phyir tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor sred pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la
86b5('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sred pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor len pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis ma
86b6('bum): khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir len pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
86b7('bum): srid pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir srid pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
86b8('bum): mi dmigs so// rab 'byor skye ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir skye ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / chang
87a1('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rga shi'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ 
87a2('bum): phyir rga shi la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
87a3('bum): gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
87a4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyi sa mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
87a5('bum): byin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa da nga mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
87a6('bum): med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
87a7('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnye ba ste/ de'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa
87a8('bum): dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnya pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam
87b1('bum): ba dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pal bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
87b2('bum): ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnye ba dang mi mnya mas
87b3('bum): soso rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir nang stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshang
87b4('bum): dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i
87b5('bum): phyir phyi stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad da nga mnye pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma
87b6('bum): gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir phyi nang stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa
87b7('bum): nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa
87b8('bum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chen po stong
88a1('bum): pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
88a2('bum): tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir don dam pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'dus bya
88a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam
88a4('bum): dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma da gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de
88a5('bum): phyir 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag ba dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid
88a6('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang / 
88a7('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir
88a8('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis
88b1('bum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa dang mi
88b2('bum): dmigs so// rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ba
88b3('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi
88b4('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chos thams cad sto/ nga ba nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnya ma pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor rang gi
88b5('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dang / ga tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste// de'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang
88b6('bum): dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang
88b7('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnye ba dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam
88b8('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigaso// 
89a1('bum): rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa
89a2('bum): dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi
89a3('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag
89a4('bum): pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzha la du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dra na ba nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
89a5('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'a byor yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi bya ba dag tu med gzhal med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir
89a6('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
89a7('bum): med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor dbang
89a8('bum): po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dbang po rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
89b1('bum): dmig so// rab 'byor stobs kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir stobs rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam
89b2('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub
89b3('bum): kyi yan lag rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
89b4('bum): dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
89b5('bum): pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'phags
89b6('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
89b7('bum): gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir bsam gtan rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor tshad med pa
89b8('bum): rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshad med pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa
90a1('bum): dang yi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du la mi mnyam
90a2('bum): ba dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor rnam par thar pa
90a3('bum): brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang
90a4('bum): mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mthar gyis gan sa pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam
90a5('bum): pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mthar gyis gnas pa'i sgo mas par 'jug pa dgu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang // tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab
90a6('bum): 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir
90a7('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor mngon par shes
90a8('bum): pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mngon par shes pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam
90b1('bum): pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ting nge 'dzin rnams
90b2('bum): la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med kas dadu med la mi mnya
90b3('bum): dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
90b4('bum): bcu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med ga/ zhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bsam pa dang
90b5('bum): dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam
90b6('bum): pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mi 'jigs pa bzhi la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ngo sa
90b7('bum): nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
90b8('bum): mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor byams pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir byams pa chen po la bsam pa dang
91a1('bum): dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa da
91a2('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir snying rje chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid bsam
91a3('bum): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
91a4('bum): mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rgyun tu
91a5('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis
91a6('bum): mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
91a7('bum): rab 'byor phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag
91a8('bum): pa dang / tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig so// rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyi/ 
91b1('bum): gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la rang byang chub dmig su yod dam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag/ 
91b2('bum): tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
91b3('bum): du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
91b4('bum): rab 'byor de bas na/ rnam grangs 'dis chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs
91b5('bum): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam pa dang bral ba'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// dpag pa dang bral ba'i phyir dpag tu med pa'o// tshang dang bral ba
91b6('bum): phyir gzhal du med pa'o// mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa dang bral ba'i phyir mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
91b7('bum): med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di ni bsam pa las yongs su 'das pas na bsam gyis
91b8('bum): mi khyab pa'o// dpag pa las yongs su 'das pas na dpag tu med pa'o// tshad las yongs su 'das pas na gzhal du med pa'o// mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa las yongs su 'das pas
98a1('bum): na mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba 'di ni bsam du med pa'i tshig bla dgas so// rab 'byor dpag tu med ces bya ba 'di
98a2('bum): ni dpag tu med pa'i tshig bla dag so// rab 'byor gzhal du med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tshad med pa'i ngo bo tshig bla dgas so// rab 'byor mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya bar de ni mnyam pas
98a3('bum): mnyam pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas ste/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
98a4('bum): bdang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba ni/ nam mkha'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// dpag tu med ces bya ba ni/ nam mkha'i khams
98a5('bum): dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro// gzhal du med ces bya ba ni nam mkha'i khams tshad med pa'i phyir ro// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba ni na mkha'i kham mi mnyam pa dang
98a6('bum): mnyam pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos de dag ni bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de dag ni
98a7('bum): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bsam pa 'am/ dpag par mi nus te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas rnams ni gzhal du med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni gzhal du
98a8('bum): med do// de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i
98b1('bum): tshe dge slong lnga brgya nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong ma brgya phrag nyi shus nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par
98b2('bum): grol lo// dge bsnyen pa stong phrag drug cu dang / dge bsnyen ma stong phrag sum cus ni chos rnams la rdul dang bral zhing dri ma dang bral ba'i chos kyis mig rnam par dag go// byang chub sems
98b3('bum): dpa' stong phrag nyi shus ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/ de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// // 
98b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u sum cu bzhi'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'ad
98b5('bum): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa ste/ bcom ldan 'dra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po
98b6('bum): slad du nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chad ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu
98b7('bum): mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don gzhal du ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol
98b8('bum): tu phyin pa 'di ni don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
99a1('bum): pa 'di ni don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
99a2('bum): pa 'di ni don tshad med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don mi mnyam
99a3('bum): pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me 'dir ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'dus so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
99a4('bum): pa zab mo 'dir ni nang stong pa nyid 'dus so// phyi stong pa nyid 'dus so// phyi nang stong pa nyid 'dus so// steng pa nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so// chen po steng pa nyid 'dus so// don dam pa
99a5('bum): stong pa nyid 'dus so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus so// mtha' las 'ang sa pa stong pa nyid 'dus so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa sto
99a6('bum): pa nyid 'dus so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'dus so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'dus so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'dus so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so// mi dmigs
99a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid 'dus so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'dus so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'du sa// / 
99a8('bum): yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'dus so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'dus so// dbang po lnga 'dus so// stobs lnga 'dus so// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'dus so// 'phags pa'i lam
99b1('bum): yan lag brgyad pa 'dus so// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'dus so// bsam gtan bzhi 'dus so// tshad med pa bzhi 'dus so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'dus so// rnam
99b2('bum): par thar pa brgyad 'dus so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'dus so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'dus so// mngon
99b3('bum): par shes pa rnams 'dus so// ting nge 'dzin rnams 'dus so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'dus so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'dus so// mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'dus so// so so
99b4('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'dus so// byams pa chen po 'dus so// snying rje chen po 'dus so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'dus so// rgyun tu zhugs
99b5('bum): pa'i 'bras bu 'dus so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dus so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dus so// dgra bcom pa nyid 'dus so// rang byang chub 'dus so// 
99b6('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'das so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'dus so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba srid brtan par
99b7('bum): gyur pa'i rgyal po'i dgos pa 'am/ yul gyi dgos pa gang ci yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad la blon po las su bcug na/ de'i tshe rgyal po ni rgyal po'i dgos pa dang / yul gyi
99b8('bum): dgos pa la snying las chung zhing khur bor ba yin/ rab 'byor de bzhin du nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas
100a1('bum): kyi chos gang yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'dus te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de ngag gi bya byed do// rab 'byor de bas
100a2('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes
100a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba dpag tu med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba gzhal du med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha
100a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyi ra nye bar gnas pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ni
100a5('bum): gzugs la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par cha gas pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// tshor ba la yod su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med
100a6('bum): par nye bar gnas pa'o// 'du shes la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// 'du byed la yong su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par
100a7('bum): chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// rnam par shes pa la yongasu 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// mig la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa/ 
100a8('bum): dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// rna ba la yong su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// sna la yongasu 'dzin pa med pa
100b1('bum): dang mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// lce la yongasu la ni pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// lus la yongasu 'dzin
100b2('bum): pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// yid la yong su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// gzugs la yongasu 'dzin
100b3('bum): ba med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// sgral yongasu 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// dri la yongasu 'dzin pa med
100b4('bum): pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// ro la yongasu 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// reg la yongasasu 'dzin pa
100b5('bum): med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gan sa pa'o// chos la yong su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// 
100b6('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa la yongasasu 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon
100b7('bum): par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa la yongasu 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes
100b8('bum): pa la yong su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par byaman pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa la yong su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med pa
101a1('bum): bar gnas pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yongasu 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su
101a2('bum): 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la yong su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// snga'i
101a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa la yong su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par
