147b3('bum): 'bog pa dang / kha ton mi byed cing / tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / bsam gtan
147b4('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan mi 'a dogs pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la
147b5('bum): phan mi 'dogs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang
147b6('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang
147b7('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan lalan mi 'dogs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dog
147b8('bum): pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
148a1('bum): gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis
148a2('bum): gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la pan mi 'dogs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rang gi
148a3('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan
148a4('bum): la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/ gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / dran pa nye bar
148a5('bum): gzhag pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis gas
148a6('bum): la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / dbang po rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / stobs rnams kyis gzhan la pan mi 'dogs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
148a7('bum): kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs
148a8('bum): ba dang / bsam gtan rnams kyis gzhan la pan mi 'dogs pa dang / tshad med pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
148b1('bum): rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus gzhan la phan
148b2('bum): mi 'dogs pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / mtshan ma med pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / smon pa med pas gzhan la
148b3('bum): phan mi 'dogs pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams
148b4('bum): kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / de bzhin ga shegs pa'i stobs bcus gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhis gzhan la pan mi 'dogs
148b5('bum): pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis gzhan la pan mi 'dogs pa dang / byams pa chen pos gzha na la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / snying rje chen pos gzhan
148b6('bum): la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa
148b7('bum): dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyis gzhan
148b8('bum): la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rang byang chub kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
149a1('bum): kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par
149a2('bum): mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par
149a3('bum): mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang mthun
149a4('bum): par mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi skyo da/ chen po stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ 'dus byas
149a5('bum): stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ thog ma
149a6('bum): dang tha med pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa
149a7('bum): nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / 
149a8('bum): mthun par mi spyod/ rnga bo nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang mthun
149b1('bum): par mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang mthun par mi spod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/ dbang po rnams dang mthun par mi skyed/ stobs
149b2('bum): rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / mthun par mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden
149b3('bum): pa rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams dang mthun par mi spod/ tshad med pa rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
149b4('bum): dang mthun par mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang ma thun par mi spyod// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang mthun par mi spong / rnam par thar pa'i
149b5('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang // mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa me da pa dang mthun par mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams
149b6('bum): dang mthun par mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mthun par mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang mthun par mi
149b7('bum): spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang mthun par mi spong/ byams pa chen po dang mthun par mi spong / snying rje chen po dang mthun par mi spod/ sangs rgyas kyis chos
149b8('bum): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang mthun par mi spyod// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang mthun par mi spyod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang mthun par mi spyod/ phyir
150a1('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang mthun par mi spyod/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ rang byang chub dang mthun par mi spyod/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
150a2('bum): nyid dang mthun par mi spyod rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod na de ni gnas gnyis dang / sa gnyis po las/ sa gcig la gnas par gyur te/ 
150a3('bum): de ni 'di ltar nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rig kyi bu mo de dag gis sngon gyi mthar yang / shes
150a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ma bris ma bstan kha ton du ma byas/ tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis kyang pha rol la phan
150a5('bum): ma brtags/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang mthun par ma spang
150a6('bum): bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des gnas gnyis dang / sa gnyis po de las sa gcig la gnas par gyur par rig
150a7('bum): par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u sum cu rtsa lnga'o// 
150a8('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho'i dbus su du zhig la mi rnams shing ngam/ shing du ma 'am/ shing leb bam/ rgyal ba 'am/ rol mi 'ju mi 'dzin na/ rab 'byor mi
150b1('bum): dag ni rgya mtsho chen po'i pha rol gyi 'gram du ma phyin par dus byed par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor mi gang rgya mtsho'i dbus su gra zhig pa'i tshe/ shing ngam/ shing dam 'am/ 
150b2('bum): shing leb bam/ rgyal ba 'am/ rol 'ju zhing 'dzin pa de dag ni/ rgya mtshor dus byed par mi 'gyur te/ bde zhing nyam nyes med par rgya mtsho chen po nas/ pha rol gyi
150b3('bum): 'gram du phyin par gyur te/ ma nyes ma nyams par thang la phyin par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi tha
150b4('bum): mo dad pa tsam dang / dga' ba tsam dang / mos pa tsam dang / ldan pa gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi 'dri/ mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul
150b5('bum): bzhin du yid la mi byed cing / mi rten pa dang / bas ma gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'di mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed
150b6('bum): cing mi rten pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
150b7('bum): phyin pa mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing / mi rten pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'dra mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ 
150b8('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / nang
151a1('bum): stong pa nyid mi 'di mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ 
151a2('bum): ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing
151a3('bum): mi rten pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston// kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang // chen po stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha
151a4('bum): ton du mi byed// tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi
151a5('bum): byed cing mi rten pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yi de la mi byed cing mi ston pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong / 
151a6('bum): pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed// tshul
151a7('bum): bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha to du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / dor ba med
151a8('bum): pa stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du
151b1('bum): yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed// tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid
151b2('bum): stong pa nyid mi 'di mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul
151b3('bum): bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha tan du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong
151b4('bum): pa nyid mi 'dri mi stom/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhi na du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / dngos po me da ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du
151b5('bum): byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi 'dri mi ston// kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed
151b6('bum): cing mi rten pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed// tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
151b7('bum): 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / dbang po rnams mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed
151b8('bum): cing mi rten pa dang / stabs rnams mi 'dri mi stom kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi 'dri mi sna
152a1('bum): kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed
152a2('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi 'di mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang
152a3('bum): bsam gtan rnams mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / tshad med pa rnams mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul
152a4('bum): bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / gzugs me dpa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi 'dri mi ston/ kha to na du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa
152a5('bum): dang / rnam par thar pa rnams mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi 'dri
152a6('bum): mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi 'dri mi ston
152a7('bum): kha ton du mi byed// tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa
152a8('bum): dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi 'dri mo sten/ kha ton du mi byed
152b1('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi brten pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi 'dri mi ston/  du byang chung nad du yang la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / mi 'jigs
152b2('bum): ba bzhi mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi 'dre mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul
152b3('bum): bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / byams pa chen po mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / snying rje chen po me
152b4('bum): mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / 
152b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi 'dri mi ston/ kha tan du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / thams
152b6('bum): cad shes pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul
152b7('bum): bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi 'dri mi ston/ kha ton du mi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa de dag ni bar ma
152b8('bum): byang chub las nyams par gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon du byed par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor ga
153a1('bum): zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i don du/ dang pa yod cing
153a2('bum): bzod pa dang / mos pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / dga' ba dang / spro ba dang / mi gtong ba yod cing / brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
153a3('bum): mo 'di 'dra'o// lung 'bog go// kha ton du byed do// tshul bzhin du yid la byed do// rten par byed do// de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag bla na med pa
153a4('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dad pa yod de/ bzod pa yod/ mos pa yod pa lhag pa'i bsam pa yo da/ dga' ba yod/ spro ba yod/ mi gtong ba yod/ 
153a5('bum): brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yod pa yin te/ de'i phyir she/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung ba dang / 
153a6('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung ba dang / 
153a7('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung ba dang / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba
153a8('bum): dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasasu bzung ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yong su bzung ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung
153b1('bum): ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / mtha' las 'das sa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba dang // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba dang
153b2('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rang gi
153b3('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasasu bzung ba dang / mi dmig pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasasu bzung ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa
153b4('bum): nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pas yongasu bzung ba dang / yang dag par spong ba
153b5('bum): yongasu bzung ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas yongasu bzung ba dang / dbang pos yongasu bzung ba dang / stobs kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
153b6('bum): gis yongasu bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongasu bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pas yongasu bzung ba dang / bsam gtan gyis yongasu bzung ba dang / tshad
153b7('bum): med pas yongasu bzung ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas yongasu bzung ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
153b8('bum): 'jug pa dgus yongasu bzung ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongasu bzung ba dang / mngon par shes pas yongasu bzung ba dang / 
154a1('bum): ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ba dang / gzungs kyi sgos yongasu bzung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongasu bzung ba dang / mi 'jigs pa
154a2('bum): bzhis yongasu bzung ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongasu bzung ba dang / byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung ba dang / snying rje chen pos yongasu bzung ba dang / sangs
154a3('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongasu bzung ba dang // thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / rnam
154a4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas par ma dor nye zho med par nyan thos kyi sa las 'das/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' ste/ sems can yongasu smin par bya
154a5('bum): nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngo na par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro// rab 'byor
154a6('bum): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bud med dam/ skyes pa la la zhig bum pa ma bsregs shing so ma btang bas chu bcu par sems na/ rab 'byor bum pa de ni ring por mi gnas te/ myur
154a7('bum): du dgyes shing 'jig par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni bum pa de so ma btang ba'i phyir te/ de ni tha mar sa nyid du 'gyuraro// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i
154a8('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag la yang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir dad pa'ang yod
154b1('bum): bzod pa'ang yod/ mos pa'ang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/ dga' ba yang yod/ spro ba'ang yod/ mi gtong ba'ang yod/ brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba 'ang
154b2('bum): yod med kyi de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung / thabs mkhas pas yongasu ma bzung / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung / 
154b3('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung / sbyin pa
154b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyi sa yongasu ma bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma
154b5('bum): bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma pa zung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / 'dus
154b6('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / thog ma dang tha ma med pa
154b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis
154b8('bum): yongasu ma bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu
155a1('bum): ma bzung / nga ba nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / dngos po med pa'i rnga bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
155a2('bum): kyis yongasu ma bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung
155a3('bum): dbang po rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / stobs rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
155a4('bum): pas yongasu ma bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongasu ma ba zung // tshad med pa rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / 
155a5('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yod sa su ma bzung / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs sum bzung / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
155a6('bum): par 'jug pa dgas yongs su ma bzung / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs su ma bzung / mngon par shes
155a7('bum): pa lngas yongasu mi bzung / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
155a8('bum): bcus yongasu ma bzung / mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongasu ma bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongasu ma bzung / byam pa chen pos yongasu ma bzung / snying rje chen pos
155b1('bum): yongs su ma bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongasu ma bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid yongasu ma bzung / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung
155b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am// rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bar ma dor nye zhor 'gyur bar shes par bya'o// 
155b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag pa// 'am chis pa mngan bdan pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bar ma dor nye zhor
155b4('bum): 'gyur ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med la la zhig bum pa so legs pa
155b5('bum): btang bas chu klung ngam/ mtsho 'am/ mtshe'u 'am/ khron pa nas chu rgu na/ rab 'byor chu chu ba'i bum pa de sa ni bde bar khyim du phyin par rig par bya'o// ra
155b6('bum): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod/ bzod pa'ang yod/ mos pa
155b7('bum): 'ang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang yod/ dga' ba'ang yod/ spro ba'ang yod/ mi gtong ba'ang yod/ brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba'ang yod la// de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol
155b8('bum): phyin pas yongasu bzung / thabs mkhas pas yongasu bzung // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung / bzod pa'i
156a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis
156a2('bum): yongasu bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung
156a3('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / mtha' 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu
156a4('bum): bzung / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzu nga/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yong su bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / chos thams cad
156a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis
156a6('bum): yongasu bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung // dran pa nye bar gzhag pas yongasu bzung / yang dag
156a7('bum): par spong bas yongasu bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas yongasu bzung / bang pos yong su bzung / stonas kyis yo su lung byang chub kyi yan lag gis yongasu bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
156a8('bum): pas yongasu bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pas yongs su bzung // bsam gtan gyis yongasu bzung / tshad med pas yongs su bzung / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas
156b1('bum): yongasu bzung / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongasu bzung / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongasu bzung / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtsham
156b2('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongasu bzung / mngon par shes pas yongasu bzung / ting nge 'dzin gyis yongasu bzung // gzungs kyi sgos yongasu bzung / de bzhin gshes
156b3('bum): pa'i stobs bcus yongasu bzung / mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongasu bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongasu bzung // byams pa chen pos yongasu bzung / snying rje chen pos
156b4('bum): yongasu bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgya da kyis yongasu bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su
156b5('bum): bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am
156b6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar bar ma dor nye zhor mi 'gyur te/ mnyes ma nyams par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta
156b7('bum): ste dper na/ rgya mtsho'i grum bsdams shing / zag glan ma byas par rdzas bcug ste tshu la btang na/ rab 'byor gru de ni zhig par 'gyur te/ gru yang logs shig/ rdzas kyang
156b8('bum): logs shig tu song nas/ de ltar tshong pa de thabs mi mkhas pas/ gnod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / rin po che chen po las yongasu pang par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor
157a1('bum): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa'ang yod/ bzod pa'ang yod/ 
157a2('bum): pa'ang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang yod/ dga' ba'ang yod/ spro ba yang yod// mi gtong ba'ang yod// brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yang yod mod kyi de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas
157a3('bum): yongasu ma bzung / thabs mkhas pas yongasu ma bzung / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung
157a4('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung / tshul khri mas kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / sgra na ba'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung / nang stong pa
157a5('bum): nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yodasu ma bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid yongasu ma bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / chen po stong pa
157a6('bum): nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung // 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongasu ma bzung // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung // mtha' las 'das
157a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma
157a8('bum): bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / dngos po med pa stong
157b1('bum): pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs
157b2('bum): su ma bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / dbang po rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / stobs rnams kyis
157b3('bum): yongasu ma bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan brgyad pas yongasu ma bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung
157b4('bum): bsam gtan rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung // tshad med pa rnams kyis yongasu bzung / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / rnam par thar
157b5('bum): pa brgyad kyis yongasu ma bzung / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongasu ma bzung / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang
157b6('bum): smon pa med pas yongasu ma bzung / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / de bzhin
157b7('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongasu ma bzung / mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongasu ma bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su ma
157b8('bum): bzung / snying rje chen pos yongasu ma bzung // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongasu ma bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
158a1('bum): nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung na// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por ni bar ma
158a2('bum): nye zhor 'gyur te/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rin po che'i don chen po dang bral zhing rin po che chen po las 'phang bar rig par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
158a3('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi bar ma do'i nye zho gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can la
158a4('bum): la zhig/ rgya mtsho chen po'i gru shin tu bsdams shing shin tu bstar pa chu la gtong zhing rdzas 'jug na/ rab 'byor rgyo mtsho'i gru de ni bar ma dor zhig par mi 'gyur te/ gru des
158a5('bum): phyogs gang du bgrod pa der phyin par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la bla na med pa yang dag par
158a6('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa'ang yod/ bzod pa yang yod/ mos pa yang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/ dga' ba yang yod/ spro ba yang yod/ mi gtong ba yang yod
158a7('bum): brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yang yod la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung / thabs mkhas pas yongasu bzung / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs bzung
158a8('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongasasu bzung
158b1('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyis yong su bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongasasu bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongasasu bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis
158b2('bum): yongasu bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong
158b3('bum): pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / chos thams
158b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yong su bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasasu bzung / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasasu bzung
158b5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasasu bzung / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / dran pa nye bar ga zhag pa rnams kyis yong su bzung / yang dag par spong ba
158b6('bum): rnams kyis yongasu bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongasu bzung / dbang po rnams kyis yongasu bzung / stobs rnams kyis yongasu bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
158b7('bum): kyis yongasu bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongasu bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongasu bzung / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su bzung / tshang
158b8('bum): med pa rnams kyis yongasu bzung / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongasu bzung / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongasu bzung / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa
159a1('bum): 'jug pa dgus yong su bzung / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yong su bzung / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis
159a2('bum): yongasu bzung / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongasu bzung / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongasu bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongasu bzung / mi 'jigs pa bzhis
159a3('bum): yongasu bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongasu bzung / byams pa chen pos yongasu bzung / snying rje chen pos yongasu bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis
159a4('bum): yongasu bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung // lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung na/ rab 'byor
159a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du bar ma dor nye zhor mi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de ni
159a6('bum): de ltar yang 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod/ bzod pa yang yod/ mos
159a7('bum): pa yang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/ dga' ba yang yod/ spro ba yang yod/ mi gtong ba yang yod/ brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yang yod la/ de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
159a8('bum): phyin pas yongasu zin par gyur/ thabs mkhas pas yongasu zin par gyur/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu zin par gyur/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs
159b1('bum): zin par gyur/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu zin par gyur/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu zin par gyur/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yong su zin par gyur
159b2('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyis yongasu zin par gyur/ phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongasu zin par gyur/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongasu zin par gyur/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma su zin par gyur/ 
159b3('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongasu zin par gyur/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu zin par gyur/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongasu zin par gyur/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis
159b4('bum): yongasu zin par gyur/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyi dkyis yongasu zin par gyur// thog ma dang tha ma med pa ste/ nga ba nyid kyis yongasu zin par gyur/ dor ba med pa stong pa
159b5('bum): nyid kyis yongasu zin par gyur/ rang bzhin stong pa'i dkyis yongasu zin par gyur/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongasu zin par gyur// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
159b6('bum): nyid kyis yongasu zin par gyur/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu zin par gyur/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu zin par gyur// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs
159b7('bum): zin par gyur/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu zin par gyur/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongasu zin par gyur/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis
159b8('bum): yongasu zin par gyur/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongasu zin par gyur/ dbang po rnams kyis yongasu zin par gyur/ stobs rnams kyis yongasu zin par gyur/ byang chub tu
160a1('bum): yan lag rnams kyis yongasu zin par gyur/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongasu zin par gyur/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis
160a2('bum): yongasu zin par gyur/ bsam gtan rnams kyis yongasu zin par gyur/ tshad med pa rnams kyis yongasu zin par gyur/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs
160a3('bum): su zin par gyur/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongasu zin par gyur/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongasu zin par gyur/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
160a4('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongasu zin par gyur/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongasu zin par gyur/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yod
160a5('bum): su zin par gyur/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongasu zin par gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongasu zin par gyur// mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongasu zin
160a6('bum): par gyur/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongasu zin par gyur/ byams pa chen pos yongasu zin par gyur/ snying rje chen pos yongasu zin par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
160a7('bum): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongasu zin par gyur/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongasu zin par gyur/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongasu zin par gyur/ rnam pa thams
160a8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongasu zin par gyur na// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ngo // rab 'byor
160b1('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/ min chod kyis lo brgya nyi shu lon pa rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa logs pa zhig yod la/ de'i lus la rlung ngam/ mkhris pa'am/ bad kan nam 'dus
160b2('bum): pa'i nad kyis btab na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mi de gcig pu nyam rangs su khri las ldang nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lagaso// 
160b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni khri las ldang nus su lags kyang / rgyang grags gcig gam/ rgyang grags gnyisu 'ong mchi bar mi nus te/ de rgas pa dang bro 'tshal pas nyams
160b4('bum): dmas pa'i slad du khri las ldang nus su lags kyang mchis par mi nus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
160b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa'ang yod/ bzod ba'ang yod/ mos pa'ang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa
160b6('bum): yang yod/ dga' ba yang yod/ spro ba'ang yod/ mi gtong ba yang yod/ brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yang yod mod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung / 
160b7('bum): thabs mkhas pas yongasu ma bzung / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
160b8('bum): bas yong su ma bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yong sum bzung / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / phyi stong pa
161a1('bum): nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
161a2('bum): ma bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
161a3('bum): kyis yongasu ma bzung / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / 
161a4('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / dngos
161a5('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / ngo za nyi nga stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / dran pa
161a6('bum): nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / yang dag par slong ba rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung // rdza 'phral gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / dbang po rnams kyis
161a7('bum): yongasu ma bzung / stobs rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongasu ma bzung / 
161a8('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / tshad med pa rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
161b1('bum): 'jug pa rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongasu ma bzung / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs
161b2('bum): su ma bzung / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongasu ma bzung / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / ting nge
161b3('bum): 'dzin rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongasu ma bzung / mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongasu ma bzung
161b4('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongasu ma bzung / byams pa chen pos yongasu ma bzung / snying rje chen pos yongasu ma bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongasu ma
161b5('bum): bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung na/ 
161b6('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar ma dor nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
161b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung ba dang / thabs mkhas pas yongasu ma bzung ba dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi
161b8('bum): pas yongasu ma bzung ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu
161b9('bum): ma bzung ba dang / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa
162a1('bum): kyis yongasu ma bzung ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung ba dang / 'dus byas
162a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa
162a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung ba dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid
162a4('bum): kyis yongasu ma bzung ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung ba dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung ba dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis
162a5('bum): yongasu ma bzung ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yo ngasu ma bzung ba dang // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung ba dang / dran pa nye bar
162a6('bum): gzhag pa rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs ma bzung ba dang / dbang po rnams kyis
162a7('bum): yongasu ma bzung ba dang / stobs rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs
162a8('bum): ma bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung ba dang / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung ba dang / tshad med pa rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung ba dang / 
162b1('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongasu ma bzung ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
162b2('bum): dgus yongasu ma bzung ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongasu ma bzung ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongasu
162b3('bum): ma bzung ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongasu ma bzung ba
162b4('bum): dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongasu ma bzung ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongasu ma bzung ba dang / byams pa chen pos yongasu ma bzung ba dang / snying
162b5('bum): chen pos yongasu ma bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongasu ma bzung ba dang / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung ba dang / lam
162b6('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi na chod kyis lo brgya
162b7('bum): nyi shu lon pa/ rgas pa dgog tu gyur pa/ 'khogs pa de nyid/ rlung ngam/ mkhris pa 'am/ bad kan nam/ 'dus pa'i nad kyis btab par gyur la/ de khri ldang bar 'dod na
162b8('bum): de la skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa gnyis kyis glo g.yas g.yon nas bzung ste/ brten nas/ 'di skad du kye skyes bu khyod ji dga' ba'i don du gar 'dod par 'dong ngo // khyed ni bdag cag gis
163a1('bum): gnas der ma phyin gyi bar du lam du bar mdor rdeg 'cha' bas 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// zhes bsgo ba de bzhin du/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
163a2('bum): dpa' chen po gang la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod/ bzod pa yang yod/ mos pa yang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/ dga' ba yang yod// 
163a3('bum): spro ba yang yod/ mi gtong ba yang yod/ brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yang yod la/ de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung / thabs mkhas pas yongasu bzung / bsam gtan
163a4('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
163a5('bum): yongasu bzung / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung // nang stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung
163a6('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasasu bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / 'dus
163a7('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / dor ba med pa stong pa
163a8('bum): nyid kyis yongasu bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung
163b1('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasasu bzung / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yong su bzung / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis
163b2('bum): yongs su bzung / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongasu bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongasu bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongasu bzung / dbang po
163b3('bum): rnams kyis yongasu bzung / stobs rnams kyis yongasu bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung
163b4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongasu bzung / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su bzung / tshad med pa na mas kyis yongasu bzung / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
163b5('bum): 'jug pa rnams kyis yong su bzung / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongasu bzung / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongasu bzung / rnam par
163b6('bum): thar pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs su bzung / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su
163b7('bum): gzung kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung / mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis
163b8('bum): yongasu bzung / byams pa chen pos yongasu bzung / snying rje chen pos yongasu bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongasu bzung / thams cad shes pa
164a1('bum): nyid kyis yongs su bzung / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung na/ 
164a2('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar ma dor nye zhor mi 'gyur te// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ 'di lta ste bla na med pa yang dag par
164a3('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi gnas der phyin par nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral ba'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ 
164a4('bum): ldan 'das ji ltar na/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
164a5('bum): kyi sar mi lhung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod de ltar gang zag byang chub sem sa dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyi don du de bzhin gshegs pa
164a6('bum): la don 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so legs so// rab 'byor 'di la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thog mar sbyin pa yongasu gtong na/ de bdag dang bdag gir ltung ba'i
164a7('bum): sems kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / bzod pa bsgom pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / shes
164a8('bum): rab bsgom no de yang bdag dang bdag gir ltung ba'i sems kyis shes rab sgom ste/ de sbyin pa yongasu gtong ba'i tshe/ 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni sbyin pa yongasu gtong
164b1('bum): basbyin pa yang su gtang ngo // bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa la/ bdag ni tshul khrims srung // dul khrims ni 'di srung ngo // bdag na tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o// bdag ni bzang ba skams
164b2('bum): bzod pa ni 'di snyam mo// bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o// bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo// brtson 'grus ni 'di tsam mo// bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o// bdag ni bsam gtan
164b3('bum): ngag la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan ni 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug go// bdag ni bsam gtan pa'o// bdag ni shes rab sgom mo// shes rab ni 'di sgom mo// bdag ni shes
164b4('bum): rab dang ldan pa'o// snyam nas// des sbyin pa rlom sems su byed/ sbyin pas rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o// zhes rloms sems su byed/ de tshul khrims
164b5('bum): rlom sems su byed/ tshul khrims kyis rlob sems su byed/ bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sa mas su byed/ de bzod pa rlom sems su byed/ bzod
164b6('bum): pas rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de brtson 'grus rlom sems su byed/ brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni brtson 'grus
164b7('bum): dang ldan pa'o// zhes rlom sems su byed/ de bsam gtan rlom sems su byed/ bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni bsam gtan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ 
164b8('bum): shes rab rlom sems su byed/ shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'i zhes rnams su byed do// ji ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyir pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
165a1('bum): pade dag med de/ ring du song ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa de dag med de/ ring du song ba ni tshul khrims kyi
165a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa de dag med de/ ring du song ba ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa de
165a3('bum): dag med de/ ring du song ba ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa de dag med de/ ring du song ba ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
165a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa de dag med de/ ring du song ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de ltar yin yang gang zag rgya na sems dpa'i theg pa pa
165a5('bum): de ring du song ba'ang mi shes/ pha rol kyang mi shes te/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzu nga / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su
165a6('bum): ma bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma
165a7('bum): bzung / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yong su ma bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis
165a8('bum): yang su ma bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung
165b1('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / thog ma dang tham
165b2('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung chos thams cad
165b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po med pa stong pa
165b4('bum): nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid da kyis yongs su ma bzung // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
165b5('bum): rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / dbang po rnams kyis
165b6('bum): yongs su ma bzung / stobs rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongasu ma bzung
165b7('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / tshad med pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzugs med pa
165b8('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongasu ma bzung / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma
166a1('bum): bzung / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs su ma bzung / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su
166a2('bum): ma bzung / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su ma bzung / mi
166a3('bum): 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung
166a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs
166a5('bum): sum bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad
166a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ngo // rab 'byor ji ltar na gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thabs mi mkhas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'
166a7('bum): theg pa pa thog mor thabs med par sbyin pa yongs su gtong / thabs med par tshul khrims srung / thabs med par bzod pa bsgom/ thabs med par rtson 'grus rtsom/ thabs
166a8('bum): med par bsam gtan la snyoms por 'jug/ thabs med par shes rab sgom zhing / de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni sbyin pa yongasu gtong ngo // sbyin pa ni 'di yongasu gtong
166b1('bum): ngo 'di la ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo // tshul khrims ni 'di srung ngo // bdag ni bzod pa bsgom mo// bzod pa ni 'di sgom mo// bdag
166b2('bum): ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo// brtson 'grus ni 'di rtsom mo// bdag ni bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan ni 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug go/ 
166b3('bum): bdag ni shes rab sgom mo// shes rab ni 'di bsgom mo// zhes de sbyin pa rlom sems su byed/ sbyin pas rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni sbron pa byed pa'o// zhes rlom
166b4('bum): sems su byed/ de tshul khrims rlom sems su byed/ tshul khrims kyis rloms sems su byed bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan po'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ 
166b5('bum): de bzod pa rlom sems su byed/ bzod pas rlom sa mas su byed/ bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o zhe sa rlom sems su byed/ de brtson 'grus rlom sems
166b6('bum): su byed/ brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de bsam gtan rlom sems su byed/ bsam
166b7('bum): gtan gyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de shes rab rlom sems su byed/ shes rab kyis rlom sems su
166b8('bum): byed/ bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji ltar de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag/ sbyin pa'i pha rol
167a1('bum): tu phyin pa la med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// ji ltar de rnam par
167a2('bum): rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med
167a3('bum): pa'o// ji ltar de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ni
167a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// ji ltar de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
167a5('bum): 'di lta ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// ji ltar de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
167a6('bum): med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// ji ltar de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag
167a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// de lta yin yang
167a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni ring du song ba yang mi shes/ pha rol yang mi shes te/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi
167b1('bum): pas yongs su ma bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
167b2('bum): pas yongs su ma bzung / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su pa bzung / 
167b3('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis
167b4('bum): yongs su ma bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs
167b5('bum): su ma bzung / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi sa yongs su ma bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yong
167b6('bum): su ma bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis
167b7('bum): yongs su ma bzung / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis
167b8('bum): yongs su ma bzung / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yang
168a1('bum): su ma bzung / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / stobs rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma
168a2('bum): bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su
168a3('bum): ma bzung / tshad med pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs
168a4('bum): ma bzung / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma bzung / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang
168a5('bum): smon pa med pas yongs su ma bzung / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / ting 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzungs
168a6('bum): kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su ma bzungami 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / so so yang dag
168a7('bum): par rig pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis
168a8('bum): yongs su ma bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongasu ma bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yong
168b1('bum): ma bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ngo // rab 'byor ji ltar gang zag byang chub sems
168b2('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung / nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis sar mi ltung zhing / bla na med pa
168b3('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'grub par 'gyur ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thog mar sbyin pa yongs su gtong na/ bdag
168b4('bum): dang bdag gis bya bar ma lhung ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa yo ngas su gtong ngo // tshul khrims srung ba na bdag dang bdag gis bya bar ma lhung ba'i sems kyis tshul khrims
168b5('bum): srung ngo // bzod pa bsgom na bdag dang bdag gor bya ba ram lhung ba'i sems kyis bzod pa bsgom mo// brtson 'grus rtsom ni bdag dang bdag gir bya bar ma
168b6('bum): lhung ba'i sems kyis brtson 'grus rtsom mo// bsam gtan sgom na bdag dang bdag gir bya bar ma lhung ba'i sems kyis bsam gtan sgom mo// shes rab sgom na bdag dang
168b7('bum): bdag gir bya bar ma lhung ba'i sems kyis shes rab sgom ste/ de 'di snyam du bdag ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // 'di la sbyin pa yongasu gtong ngo zhes bya bar mi sems so
168b8('bum): bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo // tshul khrims ni 'di srung ngo // zhes bya bar mi sems so// bdag ni bzod pa bsgom mo// bzod pa ni 'di skam mo// zhes bya bar mi sems so/ 
169a1('bum): bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo// brtson 'grus ni 'di rtsom mo zhes bya bar mi sems so// bdag ni bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go// bas
169a2('bum): gtan ni 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug go zhes bya bar mi sems so// bdag ni shes rab sgom mo// shes rab ni 'di sgom mo zhes bya bar mi sems te/ de sbyin pa rlom sems su mi byed
169a3('bum): sbyin pas rlom sems su mi byed/ bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed do// tshul khrims rlom sems su mi byed/ tshul khrims kyis rlom semasu mi byedapa
169a4('bum): bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed do// bzod pa rlom sems su mi byed/ bzod pas rlom sems su mi byed/ bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o zhes
169a5('bum): bya bar rlom sems su mi byed do// brtson 'grus rlo ma sems su mi byed/ brtson 'grus kyis rlom sem sa su mi byed/ bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o zhes
169a6('bum): bya bar rlom sems su mi byed do// bsam gtan rlom sems su mi byed/ bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ bdag ni bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o zhes
169a7('bum): bya bar rlom sems su mi byed do// shes rab rlom sems su mi byed/ shes rab kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems su
169a8('bum): mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gis de rlom semasu byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la med de/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
169a9('bum): phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// de ni 'di ltar de rlom semasu byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni nu srin kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med de/ 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi / 
169b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// de ni 'di ltar de rlom sems su myed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la med de// 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol/ 
169b2('bum): phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// de ni 'di ltar de rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med de/ 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi
169b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// de ni 'di ltar de rlob sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med de/ 'di ltar bsam gtan
169b4('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// de ni 'a de ltar de rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med de/ 'di ltar shes rab tu
169b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// de lta yi nal dang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de'ang ring du song ba shes shing / pha rol shes te/ des kyang rlom
169b6('bum): sems su mi byed cing / de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
169b7('bum): 'grub par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
169b8('bum): 'grub par 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ldang ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
170a1('bum): 'grub par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa tha
170a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams
170a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams
170a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams
170a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'a ma rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams
170a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams
170a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas// nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams
170a8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grib par 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams
170b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams
170b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams
170b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams
170b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// mtha' la swa p+ta stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa
170b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba sa/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
170b6('bum): sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
170b7('bum): rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am// rang
170b8('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan
171a1('bum): thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa srid kyis yongs su brdungs pas
171a2('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// mi dpags pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
171a3('bum): sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ 
171a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
171a5('bum): pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyidang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi lhung ste/ rnam pa thams
171a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
171a7('bum): kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par
171a8('bum): 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bzungs pas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// dbang po
171b1('bum): rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// stobs rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas
171b2('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ldang ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongasu bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
171b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa
171b4('bum): mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis yongs su bcu nga bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung
171b5('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan bzhis yongs su bzung bas/ nyam thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams
171b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// tshad med pa bzhis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par
171b7('bum): 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// 
171b8('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// mthar gyis gnas pa'i
172a1('bum): sems par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung bas/ lan thos kyis 'ag sangs rgyas kyis ma ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pas kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// rnam
172a2('bum): thang ba'i sgo spong bzhid dang / pa ngan pa med pa dang / sbed pa med pas yongs su bzu bas/ nyam thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ya pa 'grub pa
172a3('bum): 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// nge 'dzin rnams
172a4('bum): kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub bor 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongasu bzung
172a5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su bzung bas/ 'am
172a6('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhor ba nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
172a7('bum): ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kying 'grub par 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad
172a8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// snyi
172b1('bum): rje chen pos yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// sas rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung bas/ 
172b2('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thang mkhyer ba nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ldang
172b3('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad ma
172b4('bum): ba nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
172b5('bum): 'grub par 'gyur ro// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// bam po nyas bya co brgyad pa/ rab 'byor de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa
172b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas/ thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung bas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzla
172b7('bum): ba/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba/ nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ phyi stong
172b8('bum): ba nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzu ba/ stong pa zhing stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ ngonangam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
173a1('bum): bzung ba/ 'dus pas snang ba yid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ 'dus ma bas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung gzig
173a2('bum): dang tha ma med pa steng pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ dor ba med pa steng pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ rang bzhid steng ba nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ chos grang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ rang gi mtshar
173a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ de bo zhing stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ ngos po med pa'i ngo bzhi
173a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yod su bzung ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung
173a5('bum): dbang po rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ stobs rnams kyis yong su bzung ba/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ba zung ba/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su
173a6('bum): bzung ba/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ bsam gtan bzhis kyis yongs su bzung ba/ tshad med pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhis yongasu
173a7('bum): bzung ba/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongasu bzung ba/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung ba/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smin pa med pas
173a8('bum): yongs su bzung ba/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ ting 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus
173b1('bum): yongs su bzung ba/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba/ byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung ba/ snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung ba/ sangs rgyas
173b2('bum): kyi ches ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su
173b3('bum): bzung ga nam thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ma ltung ngo // rab 'byor ji ltar na gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor ri la gang zag byang chub
173b4('bum): sems dpe'i theg pa pa thog mar thabs dang ldan par sbyin pa yongs su gtong / thabs dang ldan par tshul khrims srung / thabs dang ldan par bzod pa bsgom/ thabs dang ldan par brtsor 'grus rtsom/ thabs dang
173b5('bum): ldan par bsapa gtan la snyoms par 'jug/ thabs dang lnga na par shes rab bsgom zhing 'di ltar de bdag ni sbyor pa yongasu gtong ngo // sbyin pa 'di yongs su gtong ngo // 'di la sbyir ba yongs
173b6('bum): su gtong ngo snyam du mi sems so// 'di ltar bdag ni tshul khrims snang ngo // tshul khrims ni 'di srang ngo snyam du mi sems so// 'di ltar bdag ni bzod pa sgom mo// bzod pa ni 'di sgom mo snyam du mi sems so// 'di lta
173b7('bum): bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo// brtson 'grus ni 'di rtsom mo snyam dus sem so// 'di ltar bdag ni bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan ni 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug go snyam du mi sems
173b8('bum): 'di ltar bdag ni shes rab sgom mo// shes rab ni 'di bsgom mo snyam du mi sems so// de sbyin pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sbyin pas rlom sems su mi byed/ bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o zhes rlom sems su mi byed do// 
174a1('bum): sems su ma byed/ bdag na na 'grus da ldan pa'o// zhes rlom sems su ma bying / 
174a2('bum): bsam gtan rlom sems su ma byed/ bsam gtan gyis rlob sems su mi byed/ bdag na bsam
174a3('bum): dang ldan pa'o// zhes rlom sems su mi byed do// de shes rab rlom sems su mi byed// shes rab kyis rlob
174b1('bum): rna sems su ma / banashes ldan par zhe rlo semasang / @
174b2('bum): de ltar de rnam pa mdzeg pas sbyin ba lal na lan pa pa ga pa de dag mang
174b3('bum): tsa byor nan/ don 'di sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi gyur pa med / 
174b4('bum): par mi rtog pas chu khrims kyi rol tu phyin pa desarnamapar chog bde ga/ ma
174b5('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltara'adi lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi btu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// 
174b6('bum): lngang de rnam par mchog pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pade dag med de/ de ci'i phyir zhen
175a1('bum): de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// de ltar de rnam par mi rdeg pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
175a2('bum): tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// de ltar de rnam par mi rtog pas/ 
175a3('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'o// de ltar de rnam par mi rtog
