255b5('bum): kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems
255b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go chang ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shin tu
255b7('bum): med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// / 
255b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ sum rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dran pa nye bar
256a1('bum): gzhag pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhug pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub
256a2('bum): sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni yang dag
256a3('bum): par spong ba dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go chad
256a4('bum): ni yang dag par spong ba dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'i go cha de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ 
256a5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kya pa shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
256a6('bum): dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dbang pod 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dbang po rnams kyang
256a7('bum): shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang mang bas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dbang po dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
256a8('bum): go cha de ni stobs dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor stobs rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni stobs
256b1('bum): dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni byang chub kyi yan lag dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
256b2('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni byang chub kyi yan lag dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor
256b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam
256b4('bum): yan lag brgyad pa yang shin tu med la/ byang chub se mas dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'brel pa
256b5('bum): ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa da nga 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
256b6('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab
256b7('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni bsam gtan dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub
256b8('bum): sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni bsam gtan dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni tshad med
257a1('bum): pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor tshad med pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med
257a2('bum): pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni tshad med pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms
257a3('bum): par 'jug pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang
257a4('bum): med pas/ de'i phyir go ma de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha
257a5('bum): de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad kyipa shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med
257a6('bum): bas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
257a7('bum): 'jug pa dgu dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dgu yang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ 
257a8('bum): de'i phyir go chad ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo
257b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / 
257b2('bum): smon pa med pa yang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang man pa dbas rmo bapa 'a dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya
257b3('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni mngon par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/ 
257b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni mngon par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
257b5('bum): chen po'i go cha de ni ting nge 'dzin dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med
257b6('bum): bas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni ting nge 'dzin dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni gzungs kyi sgo dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ 
257b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang shin tu meng la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni gzungs kyi sgo dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes
257b8('bum): bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin
258a1('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sto
258a2('bum): dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni mi 'jigs pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mi
258a3('bum): 'jigs pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha ni mi 'jigs pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems
258a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ so so yang da ga par rig pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang shi
258a5('bum): tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas de'i phyir go cha de ni so so yang dag par rig pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
258a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni byams pa chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byams pa chen po yang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang
258a7('bum): med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni byams pa chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni snying rje chen po dang 'brel pa
258a8('bum): ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor snying rje chen po yang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni snying rje chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// / 
258b1('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi
258b2('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sem dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// 
258b3('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go chang ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
258b4('bum): 'bras bu yang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub
258b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni lan cig/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor lan cig phyir
258b6('bum): ba'i 'bras bu yang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab
258b7('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang shin
258b8('bum): tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
259a1('bum): dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dgra bcom pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid kyang shin tu meng la/ byang chub
259a2('bum): sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dgra bcom pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rang byang chub
259a3('bum): dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rang byang chub kyang shin tu meng la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rang byang chub dang 'brel pa ma
259a4('bum): yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
259a5('bum): 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang 'brel pam
259a6('bum): yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sede' sem dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad
259a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor
259a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa gang dag gis sems can thams cad bdag cag gis yongasu mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// / 
259b1('bum): zhes go cha bgos pa de dag gi go cha ni chos thams cad dang 'brel pa ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// sems can thams cad
259b2('bum): yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal pa des/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs par mi bgyis te/ bcom ldan 'das sems
259b3('bum): can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
259b4('bum): ltung ba'i gnas dang skabs ma mchis te/ de ni gnas ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa 'a sems dpa' chen pos// sa mtshams bcad de sems
259b5('bum): can gyi don du go cha 'tshal pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyi sa don gyi dbang gang zhis mthong na/ de skad du byang chub sems
259b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha bgos shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa des/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs
259b7('bum): par mi bya'o zhes smras/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ sems can nyi tshe nyung zad cig gi slad du go cha 'tshal pa ma lags
259b8('bum): ye shes cung zad 'a tshe zhig gi slad du go cha 'tshal pa ma lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can thams cad yongasu
260a1('bum): mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du go cha 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
260a2('bum): kyi slad du go cha 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can nyung
260a3('bum): zad nyi tshe'i dor du go cha bgos pa ma yin/ ye shes cung zad nyi tshe'i don du go cha bgos pa ma yin gyi/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ sems can thams
260a4('bum): cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang / thams cad mkhyen ba'i ye shes kyi don tu go cha bgos pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
260a5('bum): 'di ni shin tu zab pa ste/ de ni sus kyang bsgom par ma bgyi/ ji'ang bsgom par mi bgyi/ gang tu yang bsgom par mi bgyi ba'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
260a6('bum): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la/ gang bsgom pa 'am/ gang bsgom par bgyi ba 'am/ gang gis bsgom par bgyi ba'i chos gang yang yongs su grub pa dmig
260a7('bum): su ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni nam mkha' bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni
260a8('bum): chos thams cad bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni ma mchis pa bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
260b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
260b2('bum): nga'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni gang bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
260b3('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di
260b4('bum): / tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom lda na 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ba sgom pa 'di ni 'du shes bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// 
260b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
260b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mig bsgom
260b7('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga ste/ shes
260b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni snga bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce bsgom pa rnam par
261a1('bum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom
261a2('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
261a3('bum): pa 'di ni/ gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sgra bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan
261a4('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dri bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 
261a5('bum): ro bsgob pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ reg bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom
261a6('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chos bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
261a7('bum): 'di ni/ mig gi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bsgob
261a8('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
261b1('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'dzini/ lce'i rnam par she ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
261b2('bum): bsgom pa 'dzin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid kyi rnam
261b3('bum): par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
261b4('bum): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te re ga pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan
261b5('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'dzin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom ze'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
261b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 
261b7('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa
261b8('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// 
262a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bu bsgom pa rnam par
262a2('bum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// ba
262a3('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
262a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus kyi la dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par ba sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
262a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom ba'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
262a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chu'i khams bsgom
262a7('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ me'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di
262a8('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rlung gi khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
262b1('bum): ba 'di ni/ nam mkha'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa'i khams
262b2('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ma rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
262b3('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
262b4('bum): 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ming dang gzugs bsgom pa rnam
262b5('bum): par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skye mched drug bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom
262b6('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ba sgom pa 'di ni/ reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa 'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
262b7('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sred pa bsgom pa rnam
262b8('bum): par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ len pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
263a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ srid pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
263a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skye ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 
263a3('bum): shi bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan
263a4('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sems can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa 'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
263a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ srog bsgom pa/ ma par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di na
263a6('bum): 'gro ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gso ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan
263a7('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skyes bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
263a8('bum): 'di ni/ gang zag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ shed can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan
263b1('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sheng bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
263b2('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ byed pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshor ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
263b3('bum): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ shes pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
263b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mthong ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni
263b5('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
263b6('bum): ngosgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ 
263b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
263b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
264a1('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'ang lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha
264a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyi stong
264a3('bum): ba nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// 
264a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan
264a5('bum): 'das 'di lnga snga/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par ba sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
264a6('bum): kyipha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni
264a7('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam
264a8('bum): par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'dini mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das la
264b1('bum): lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
264b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang
264b3('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam
264b4('bum): par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// 
264b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lngaste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'dzin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan
264b6('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
264b7('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dngos po meng pa
264b8('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa rnam par
265a1('bum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yang dag par spong ba bsgom pa rnam pa
265a2('bum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga ste/ 
265a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dbang po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ stobs
265a4('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
265a5('bum): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'phags pa'i la ma yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// 
265a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'phag pa 'den pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
265a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ bsam gtan bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshad med pa bsgom
265a8('bum): bar bsnam pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan
265b1('bum): 'das 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
265b2('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di
265b3('bum): ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
265b4('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ mngon par shes pa bsgom pa rnam pa rabasgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ting nge
265b5('bum): 'dzin bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'angs 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ba sgom pa 'di ni/ gzungs kyi sgo bsgom pa rnam par
265b6('bum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan
265b7('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mi 'jigs pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
265b8('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni byams pa chen po
266a1('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ snying rje chen po
266a2('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// 
266a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
266a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
266a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'angs 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
266a6('bum): 'di ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang byang chub bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
266a7('bum): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste
266a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de bzhin no// de
266b1('bum): bzhin te/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
266b2('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'dzin/ 'du shes bsgom pa rnam par bsgob pa'o// rab 'byor 'di
266b3('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 
266b4('bum): rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mig bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab
266b5('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgo ma pa 'di ni/ rna ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
266b6('bum): pa 'di ni/ sna bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor
266b7('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di
266b8('bum): ni/ yid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor
267a1('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sgra bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
267a2('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dri bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ro bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab
267a3('bum): 'byor 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ reg bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ches
267a4('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mig gi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// 
267a5('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom ba 'di ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam pa rabasgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
267a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce'i rnam par shes
267a7('bum): nga bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor
267a8('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
267b1('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsgo
267b2('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ 
267b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 
267b4('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par
267b5('bum): bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mig gi 'dus te/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// 
267b6('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste/ 
267b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
267b8('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus kyi 'dus
268a1('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid kyi
268a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// 
268a3('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chu'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
268a4('bum): 'di ni/ me'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rlung gi khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgob pa'o// 
268a5('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgo ma pa 'di ni/ nam mkha'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgob pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab tu
268a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ma rig pa
268a7('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes
268a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ming dang gzugs bas
268b1('bum): brnad par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skye mched drug bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste/ shes ra
268b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'i'in/ tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa
268b3('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sred pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'i
268b4('bum): nilen pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'a byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ srid pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// ra
268b5('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skye ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsku
268b6('bum): pa 'di ni/ rga shri bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'adi ni/ bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta
268b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sems can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ srog bsgom
268b8('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'gro ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
269a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gso ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
269a2('bum): ni/ skyes bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gang zag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byo
269a3('bum): 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ shed can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 
269a4('bum): bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ngi ni/ byed pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// 
269a5('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgra ma pa 'di ni/ tshor ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa 'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
269a6('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ shes pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mthong ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
269a7('bum): ba'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste/ shes rab
269a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 
269b1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
269b2('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sa la gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab
269b3('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
269b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyi stong pa nyid
269b5('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// 
269b6('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgo ma pa 'di ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam pa rabasgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab
269b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid
269b8('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ 
270a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes
270a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 
270a3('bum): thog ma dang tha ma meng ba stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par
270a4('bum): bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di la
270a5('bum): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ cho sa thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa 'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
270a6('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mi dmigs pa
270a7('bum): stong pa nyid bsgom pa u sgo'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ 
270a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dngos
270b1('bum): be med pa'i ngo bo 'di stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa rnam par
270b2('bum): bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yang dag par spong ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab
270b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dbang
270b4('bum): po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'a
270b5('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'dzin byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa 'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
270b6('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'phags
270b7('bum): pa'i bden pa bsgob pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ bsam gtan bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor
270b8('bum): lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshad med pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgob pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa bsgom pa'ang ni/ gzugs
271a1('bum): yed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bslab pa'o// rab 'byor 'di sa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'don/ rnam par
271a2('bum): thar pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par
271a3('bum): bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan pa med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom pa rnam pa
271a4('bum): bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mngon par shes pa ba sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes
271a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'ang
271a6('bum): ni gzungs kyi sgo bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi/ na pa bsgom pa 'di ni / de bzhi gsheg pa'i steHbsgom pa rnam par
271a7('bum): bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mi 'jigs pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes
271a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ byams
271b1('bum): mchen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'din/ snying rje chen po bsgob pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// 
271b2('bum): rab 'byor 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bam pasas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
271b3('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
271b4('bum): 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par
271b5('bum): bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab tu pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor
271b6('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang byang chub bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
271b7('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam pa thams cad
271b8('bum): mkhyen pa 'ang bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems
272a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po 'di la mngon par chags pa med dpa zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
272a2('bum): mo 'di la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi
272a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med ngam zhes bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub
272a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med dpa zhes/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
272a5('bum): chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ bzod
272a6('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'a chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen de tshul khrims kyi pha
272a7('bum): ba la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab
272a8('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
272b1('bum): po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ nang stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa'
272b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ phyi stong pa nyid la byang
272b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ 
272b4('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la
272b5('bum): mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems
272b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ chen po stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor
272b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po den dam pa steng pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes don dam pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
272b8('bum): yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dpa zhes/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la byang
273a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus pa pas spong
273a2('bum): nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
273a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su
273a4('bum): brtag par bya'o// rab 'bor byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med ngam zhes/ thog ma dang tha ma
273a5('bum): med pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dor ba med pa
273a6('bum): stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems
273a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par
273a8('bum): bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la byang chub sems
273b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ 
273b2('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs
273b3('bum): pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang
273b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa'
273b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med ngam zhes/ 
273b6('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
273b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasasu brtag par bya'o// / 
273b8('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la byang chub sems
274a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par smra
274a2('bum): ba rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub
274a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
274a4('bum): yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po rnams la mdo na bar chags pa med dam zhes/ dbang po rnams la
274a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs rnams la mngon par
274a6('bum): chags pa med dam zhes/ stobs rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
274a7('bum): po byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par chags pa med dngam zhes/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// 
274a8('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la
274b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par
274b2('bum): chags pa med dam zhes/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
274b3('bum): dpa' chen po bsam gtan rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ bsam gtan rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// 
274b4('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ tshad med pa rnams la byang chub sems
274b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs mang ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon
274b6('bum): par chags pa med dam zhes/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems
274b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med ngam zhes/ rnam par thar pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par
274b8('bum): bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i
275a1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' chems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub
275a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
275a3('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
275a4('bum): chen po mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ mngon par shes pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag
275a5('bum): par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems da ba' chen po ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la byang chub sems dang / 
275a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ gzungs kyi
275a7('bum): sgo rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la
275a8('bum): mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sem
275b1('bum): dpa' chen po mi 'jigs pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byo
275b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la byang chub
275b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa chen po la mngon par chags pa med ngam zhes/ 
275b4('bum): byams pa chen po la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje
275b5('bum): bo la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ snying rje chen po la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems
275b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mngon par chags pa mang ngam zhes/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems
275b7('bum): dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad shes pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ thams cad shes pa
275b8('bum): nying la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gyi bzhi pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med
276a1('bum): dam zhes/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems
276a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yengasu
276a3('bum): brtag par bya'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// 1phyir
276a4('bum): ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe @pha rol gyis bstan pa dang / snying por mi lnga 'am/ 
276a5('bum): phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol tu phyin pas mi 'gro 'am/ phyir
276a6('bum): mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas/ 'brogs
276a7('bum): pa ma yin nam/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas/ 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas/ 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ phyir mi ldog
276a8('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ tshul khrims
276b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur 'am/ bas
276b2('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ zhes yongs su brtag par byas te/ gal te phyir mi ldog
276b3('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur la/ zhum pa dang / 
276b4('bum): yongasu zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / de'i yid phyir nur bar mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par dga' la thos nas kyang 'dzin
276b5('bum): 'chang la/ klog cing kun chub par byed de/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed la de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des
276b6('bum): ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'od yongs su dris shing / yongs su brtag pa byas pa dang / gzung zhing bcangs de kun chub pa rlabs pa dang / tshul bzhe
276b7('bum): yid la byas par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'a
276b8('bum): tshe/ mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur la/ zhum par mi 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / de'i yid phyir mi ldog la/ thos nas kyang gong du 'dzin cing 'chang la klog cing
277a1('bum): kun chub par byed de/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi
277a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur zhing / zhum par mi 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
277a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po nges/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ji ltar brtag par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
277a4('bum): chen po des rnam pa thad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di baHga par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na
277a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba med pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me 'di la rdog pa lags/ bcas
277a6('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab
277a7('bum): 'byor mtshan ma med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor smon pa med pa la gzhal
277a8('bum): nga'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems
277b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor skye ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
277b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor 'gag pa med pa la/ gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha
277b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
277b4('bum): bzang mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor rnam par byang ba me da pal gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
277b5('bum): la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa
277b6('bum): yin/ rab 'byor chos kyi dpying la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor yang dag pa'i
277b7('bum): mtha' la gzhol nabasam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam
277b8('bum): pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas
278a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rdog pa yin/ rab 'byor mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la/ gal
278a2('bum): ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor rmi lam la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub
278a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor gzugs brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
278a4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor sgra brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
278a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor smra ga rgyu la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
278a6('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor sgyu ma la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me 'di la rtog pa yin// 
278a7('bum): rab 'byor sprul pa la gzhol pa'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de
278a8('bum): ltar stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mtshan ma med pa la gzhol ba'i
278b1('bum): bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub
278b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
278b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ skye ba ma mchi pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
278b4('bum): 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ 'gag pa ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ 
278b5('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
278b6('bum): la rtog par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pa sa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur
278b7('bum): chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la
278b8('bum): gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang
279a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la
279a2('bum): gzhol pa'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i
279a3('bum): bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ rmi lam la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa'
279a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rdog par 'gyur/ gzugs brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
279a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ smig rgyu la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
279a6('bum): byin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ sgyu ma la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rdeg par
279a7('bum): 'gyur/ sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub
279a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ 'du shes la rtog pa lags sam/ 'du byed la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes
279b1('bum): pa la rtog pa lags sam/ mig la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sna la rtog pa lags sam/ lce la rtog pa lags sam/ lus la rtog pa lags sam/ yid
279b2('bum): la rtog pa lags sam/ gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ sgra la rtog pa lags sam/ dri la rtog pa lags sam/ ro la rtog pa lags sam/ reg la rtog pa lags sam/ chos la
279b3('bum): rdog pa lags sam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ snga'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lce'i rnam par
279b4('bum): shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa
279b5('bum): lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ snga'i 'dus te reg pa la rtogs lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lus kyi
279b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg
279b7('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtogs lags sam/ 
279b8('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sa'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ chu'i
280a1('bum): khams la rtog pa lags sam/ me'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ rlung gi khams lha rtog pa lags sam/ nam mkha'i khams la rtog
280a2('bum): pa lags sab/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ ma rig pa la rtog pa lags sam/ 'du byed la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ 
280a3('bum): ming dang gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ skye mched drug la rtog pa lags sam/ reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sred pa la rtog pa lags sam/ len
280a4('bum): pa pa rtog pa lags sam/ srid pa la rtog pa lags sa ma/ skye ba la rtog pa lags sam/ rga shi la rtog pa lags sam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa
280a5('bum): lags sam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rdog pa lags sam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
280a6('bum): rtog pa lags sam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ byi steng
280a7('bum): pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ chen po stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ don dam pa stong
280a8('bum): pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa
280b1('bum): lags sam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ 
280b2('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dngos po meng pa stong pa nyid la
280b3('bum): rtog pa lags sam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam// 
280b4('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rdzul phul gyi rkang rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ dbang po rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ stobs rnams la rtog pa
280b5('bum): lags sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rtog pa lags sa ma/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rtog ba lags sam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la rtog pa
280b6('bum): lags sam/ bsam gtan rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ tshad med pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ 
280b7('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / 
280b8('bum): smon pa med pa la rtog pa lags sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rdog pa lags sam/ 
281a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams pa rtog pa lags sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la rdog
281a2('bum): ba lags sam/ byams pa chen po la rtog pa lags sam/ snying rje chen po la rtog pa lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ thams cad
281a3('bum): pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
281a4('bum): pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no// tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// 'du shes la rdog pa ma yin no// 'du byed
281a5('bum): rdog pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa la rdog pa ma yin no// mig la rtog pa ma yin no// rna ba la rtog pa ma yi na no// sna la rtog pa ma yin no// lce la rdog pa ma yino// 
281a6('bum): lus la rtog pa ma yin no// yid la rtog pa ma yin no// gzu gsal rtog pa ma yin no// sgra la rdog pa ma yin no// dri la rtog pa ma yin no// rol rdog pa ma yin no// reg la rdeg pa
281a7('bum): ma yin no// chos la rtog pa ma yin no// mig gi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// sna'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// 
281a8('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// lus kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// yid kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// mig gi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin// 
281b1('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rdog pa ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma
281b2('bum): yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// 
281b3('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma
281b4('bum): yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// sa'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no// chu'i kha mas la rtog pa ma yin no// me'i khams la rtog pa ma
281b5('bum): yin no// rlung gi khams la rtog pa ma yin no// nam mal 'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no// ma rig pa la rtog pa
281b6('bum): ma yin no// 'du byed la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// ming dang gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no// skye mched drug la rtog pa ma yin no// reg pa la rtog pa
281b7('bum): ma yin no// tshor ba la rdog pa ma yin no// sreng pa la rtog pa ma yin no// len pa la rtog pa ma yin no// srid pa la rtog pa ma yin no// skye ba la rtog pa ma yin no// rga shi la rtog pa ma yin no// 
281b8('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
282a1('bum): phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no// nang stong pa
282a2('bum): nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// phyi stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// phyi nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// chen po stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma
282a3('bum): yin no// don dam pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// 'dus byas stong nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la
282a4('bum): rtog pa ma yin no// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// chos
282a5('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// mi dmigs ba stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// dngos po med pa
282a6('bum): stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa yin no// dngos po med pa'i sa na rtog pa ma yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// yang
282a7('bum): dag par spong ba rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// dbang po rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// stobs rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// byang chub
282a8('bum): kyi yan lag rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rtog pa ma yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// bsam gtan rnams la
282b1('bum): rdog pa ma yin no// tshad med pa rnams la rtog pa pa yin no// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par thar pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// 
282b2('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la rtog pa ma yin no// mngon
282b3('bum): par shes pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyoms rnams la rtog
282b4('bum): pa ma yin no// mi 'jigs pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la rtog pa ma yi na no// byams pa chen po la rtog pa ma yin no// snying rjen
282b5('bum): po la rdog pa ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// thams cad shi pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rdog
282b6('bum): pa ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di la rdeg pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sus kyang ma bas/ rnam
282b7('bum): par ma byas/ gang nas kyang ba 'ongs/ gang du yang ma sed/ phyogs na yang mi gnas/ yul na yang mi gnas/ gang na yang mi gnas pa ste/ re la grangs kyi dmigs so// 'gro ba dang 'ong ba
282b8('bum): yang bar dmigs ste// gang la grangs mi dpogs shing / 'gro ba dang 'ong ba mi dmigs pa de ni/ gang gis kyang mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te/ gzugs kyis ma yin no// ngor bas ma
283a1('bum): yin no// 'du shes kyis ma yin no// 'du byed kyis ma yin no// rnam par shes pas ma yin no// mig gis pa yin no// rnabs ma yin no// 
283a2('bum): snas ma yin no// lces ma yin no// lus kyis ma yin no// yid kyis ma yin no// gzugs kyis ma yin no// sgras ma yin no// dris ma yin no// res ma yin no// reg gis
283a3('bum): ma yid no// chos kyis ma yin no// mig gi rnam par shes pas ma yino//  pa'i rnam glebs ma yimo/ sna'i rnam par shes pas ma yin no// lce'i rnam par shes pas ma yin no// lus kyi rnam par shes pas
283a4('bum): ma yin no// yid kyi rnam par shes pas ma yin no// mi ga gi 'dus te reg pas ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pas ma yin no// 
283a5('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pas pa yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa sa ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pas ma yin no// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no// 
283a6('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te/ 
283a7('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no// sa'i khams kyis ma yin no// chu'i khams kyis ma yin no// me'i khams kyis ma yin
