283a8('bum): no rlung gi khams kyis ma yin no// nam mkha'i khams kyis ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis ma yin no// ma rig pas ma yin no// 'du byed kyis ma
283b1('bum): yin no// rnam par shes pas ma yin no// ming dang gzugs kyis ma yin no// skye mched drug gis ma yin no// reg pas ma yin no// tshor bas ma yin no// sred pas ma yin no// 
283b2('bum): len pas ma yin no// srid pas ma yin no// skye bas ma yin no// rga shes ma yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no// 
283b3('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas pa yin no// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no// 
283b4('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// phyi stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// chen po stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// 
283b5('bum): donang ba pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyidaHsa ma yin no// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis sa
283b6('bum): yin no// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// dor ba med pa nyid kyis ma yin no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// 
283b7('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// dngos po meng pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis pa yin no// dngos
283b8('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis pa yin no// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis ma yin no// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ 
284a1('bum): dbang po rnams kyis ma yin no// spobs rnams kyis ma yin no// byang chub kyi yan lag rnam pa kyis ma yin no// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
284a2('bum): brgyad pas ma yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis ma yin no// bsam gtan rnams kyis ma yin no// chang meng pa rnams kyis ma yin no// gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa
284a3('bum): 'jug pa rnams kyis ma yin no// rnam par thar pa rnams kyis ma yin no// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug gus ma yin no// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / 
284a4('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas ma yin no// mngon par shes pa rnams kyis ma yin no// ting nge 'dzi na rnams kyis ma yin no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis
284a5('bum): ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis ma yin no// mi 'jigs parnams kyis ma yin no// sa ma yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis pa yin no// byams
284a6('bum): ba chen pos ma yin no// snying rje chen pos ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis ma yin no// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus ma yin no// lan cig phyir 'o/ 
284a7('bum): ba'i 'bras bus ma yin no// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma yin no// dgra bcom pa nyid kyis ma yin no// rang byang chub kyis ma yin no// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis ma ya
284a8('bum): no/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
284b1('bum): 'du shes nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'du byed nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 
284b2('bum): mig nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rna ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sna nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lce nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad ma
284b3('bum): ba nyid do// lus nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// yid nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sgra nyid kyang
284b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// dri nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// ro nyid kyang rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid do// reg nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad
284b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid do// ches nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa nyid do// mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rna ba'i rnam par shes
284b6('bum): pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
284b7('bum): do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam
284b8('bum): ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 
285a1('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// yid kyi 'a
285a2('bum): de reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
285a3('bum): nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i da kyang rnam
285a4('bum): ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// yid kyi 'dus te
285a5('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sa'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid do// chu'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad
285a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid do// me'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rlung gi khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams
285a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// ma rig pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'du byed nyid kyang rnam pa thams
285a8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// ming dang gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// skye mched drug nyid kyang rnam pa
285b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sred pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
285b2('bum): nyid do// len pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// srid pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// skye ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rga shi nyid kyang
285b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 
285b4('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
285b5('bum): phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad maphye na pa nyid do// nang stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
285b6('bum): pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
285b7('bum): // chen po stong pa nyid kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 
285b8('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam
286a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// dong ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
286a2('bum): 'di // chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa
286a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo ba
286a4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa nyid do// yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams
286a5('bum): cang mkhyen pa nyid do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// dbang po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// stobs nyid kyang rnam
286a6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
286a7('bum): ngo 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// bsam gtan nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// tshad med pa nyid kyang rnam pa mkhyen pa nyid do// 
286a8('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid// ma par thar pa nyid kyang rnam pazad mkhyen pa nyid do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang
286b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mngon par shes pa nyid
286b2('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// de bzhin gshegs
286b3('bum): pa'i stobs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
286b4('bum): pa nyid do// byams pa chen po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// snying rje chen po nyid kyang rnam pa tha mas cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
286b5('bum): 'dres pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
286b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
286b7('bum): de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'du byed kyi de bzhin
286b8('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
287a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
287a2('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// / 
287a3('bum): sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
287a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi na
287a5('bum): gang yin pa de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig
287a6('bum): pa'o// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 
287a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
287a8('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ro'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 
287b1('bum): reg gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
287b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
287b3('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de
287b4('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de ba zhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig

287b6('bum): rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid
287b7('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad

288a1('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa don/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
288a2('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 
288a3('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// yid
288a4('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg
288a5('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus
288a6('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa don/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
288a7('bum): tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid

288b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
288b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/

288b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin

289a1('bum): / yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid
289a2('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad

290b7('bum): de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa
290b8('bum): dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// stobs rnams kyi de bzhin 'di gang yin

291a7('bum): gcig pa'o// rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mthar gyis gnas
291a8('bum): nga'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo
291b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//

291b3('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
291b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad pa
291b5('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yi na ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
291b6('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin
291b7('bum): nyid gcig pa'o// byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// snying rje chen po'i de
291b8('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang
292a1('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 
292a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u su bcu brgyad do// / bam po'i sa de nas 'dod
292a3('bum): pa 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams lnga rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog ud pa la dang / pang po dang / ku mu pa dang / pun da rika
292a4('bum): mang po khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su 'thor bar 'gyur ro// gtor nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spri bas
292a5('bum): phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 'khod nas 'dod pa la spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
292a6('bum): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las/ 'di skad
292a7('bum): du gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
292a8('bum): tshor ba'o// 'du shes nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad ma/ 
292b1('bum): pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa 'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mig
292b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig go/ rna ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna nyid rnam pa
292b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'o// lce nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'o// lus nyid rnam pa tham
292b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus so// yid nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs nyid
292b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgra'o// 
292b6('bum): dri nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dri'o// ro nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do'o// reg nyid rnam pa
292b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg go// chos nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos so// mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid
292b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa
293a1('bum): nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par she
293a2('bum): pa'o/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
293a3('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam pa
293a4('bum): shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams ca da mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi ga gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid
293a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te/ reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
293a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus
293a7('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
293a8('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad ma/ 
293b1('bum): pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i
293b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg
293b3('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
293b4('bum): tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyi nga rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher
293b5('bum): pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher
293b6('bum): nga'o// sa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so// chu'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
293b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so// me'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang me'i khams so// rlung gi khams nyid rnam pa thams cad
293b8('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// nam mkha'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang na mkha'i
294a1('bum): khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i kham so// 
294a2('bum): ma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
294a3('bum): kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// ming dang gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
294a4('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so// skye mched drug nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye mched drug/ 
294a5('bum): reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
294a6('bum): pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sred pa'o// len pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
294a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang len pa'o// srid pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
294a8('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa
294b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
294b2('bum): pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// / 
294b3('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam
294b4('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pa rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam
294b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi da kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
294b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa tha~Md mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste
294b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stsa ba nas chen po stong pa
294b8('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
295a1('bum): pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus byas
295a2('bum): pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam pa
295a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
295a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams ca da mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
295a5('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos
295a6('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
295a7('bum): mabyed pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
295a8('bum): kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid nga // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos pa med pa stong pa nyid do// nga ba 'od stang/ 
295b1('bum): pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
295b2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
295b3('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// rdzu 'phrul
295b4('bum): gyi rkang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
295b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan
295b6('bum): lag nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
295b7('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
295b8('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsam gtan nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad ma
296a1('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
296a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par
296a3('bum): thar pa rnams so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i stoms par 'jug pa rnams
296a4('bum): so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i
296a5('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'o// mngon par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mngon par
296a6('bum): shes pa rnam so// ting nge 'dzin nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so// gzungs kyi sgo nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ 
296a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin
296a8('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// mi 'jigs pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so// so so yang dag par rig pa
296b1('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// byams pa chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
296b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o// snying rje chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
296b3('bum): pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
296b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
296b5('bum): cang mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de ba zhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 
296b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 
296b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin
296b8('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// mig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 
297a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 
297a2('bum): rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sna'i de
297a3('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lce'i de bzhin nyid
297a4('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de ba zhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lus kyi de bzhin
297a5('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi dkyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gci ga pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// yid
297a6('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// gzugs kyi
297a7('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sgra'i de bzhin
297a8('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyisu byar med do// dri'i de bzhin nyid
297b1('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// ro'i de bzhin nyid gang
297b2('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// reg gi de bzhin nyid gang yin
297b3('bum): ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
297b4('bum): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ ga nyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// mig gi rnam par
297b5('bum): shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis
297b6('bum): byar med do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su
297b7('bum): med cing gnyis su byar med do// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig
297b8('bum): pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin
298a1('bum): nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
298a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
298a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang
298a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yi na ba de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med ci nga gnyis su byar med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de ba'i
298a5('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sna
298a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 
298a7('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ga yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med
298a8('bum): do lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i byad man ny-id gang yin pa da/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyisu byar med do// 
298b1('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar
298b2('bum): med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ 
298b3('bum): gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de
298b4('bum): ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyi sa su byar med // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
298b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis cho
298b6('bum): ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 
298b7('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
298b8('bum): su med cing gnyis su byar med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin
299a1('bum): nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
299a2('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
299a3('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
299a4('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
299a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni// de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// na mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ga
299a6('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi
299a7('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang
299a8('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhi nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis byar med do// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
299b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
299b2('bum): ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
299b3('bum): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid gang
299b4('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhi na nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// reg pa'i de
299b5('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis byar med do// 
299b6('bum): tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sred pa'i
299b7('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis byar med do// 
299b8('bum): len pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis byar med do// sreng ba'i de
300a1('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis
300a2('bum): su byar med do// skye ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar
300a3('bum): med do// rga shi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyi su byar med do// sbyin pa'i
300a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis
300a5('bum): su byar med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid
300a6('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
300a7('bum): yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
300a8('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams/ 
300b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang
300b2('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
300b3('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi
300b4('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de na/ de bzhin nyi nga gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med
300b5('bum): do/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yi na pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med
300b6('bum): cing gnyis su byar med do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
300b7('bum): med cing gnyis su byar meng ngo // chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ 
300b8('bum): gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcis
301a1('bum): pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
301a2('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
301a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin 'di gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar meng ngo // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
301a4('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de ban na nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// thog pa dal ma med pa
301a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su
301a6('bum): byar med do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin teg yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing
301a7('bum): gnyis su byar med do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med
301a8('bum): cing gnyis su byar med do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa
301b1('bum): gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin 'ang gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid
301b2('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 
301b3('bum): de bzhin nyidi gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
301b4('bum): yin pa de ni/ de bzhin 'di gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
301b5('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa sde/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dang sa po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bar ngacan med yang yin pas rnam
301b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin 'ang
301b7('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// yang dag par spong ba rnams
301b8('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar mang ngo // rdzu 'phrul
302a1('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin 'di gcig pa ste/ 
302a2('bum): gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa snga
302a3('bum): gnyis su med cang gnyis su byar med // stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa snga
302a4('bum): gnyis su meng cing gnyis su byar med do// byang chub kyi ya na lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin 'di gang yin pa de ni/ 
302a5('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyisu byar med do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhye
302a6('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 'bigs pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa tham
302a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
302a8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 
302b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// gzug med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
302b2('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med ngo // rnam par
302b3('bum): thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar ma
302b4('bum): do/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhye na ba nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid
302b5('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin 'dadi gang yin pa dang
302b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med ngo // mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang
302b7('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi
302b8('bum): de bzhin 'di gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su meng cing gnyis su byar med do// gzungs
303a1('bum): sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin 'di gcig pa ste/ 
303a2('bum): gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnab pa thams cad babyedan pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa da na// 
303a3('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rngab pa thams cad mkhyeran pa nyid kyi de bzhin ring
303a4('bum): yid pa dang / de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med ngo do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin 'di gang yin pa dang / rnab pa thams
303a5('bum): cang mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhi/ nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su bya ra bad do// byams pa chen po'i nga bzhin nyid gang yin pa
303a6('bum): dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// snying rje chen po
303a7('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig paste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar yang ngo // sangs rgyas
303a8('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis
303b1('bum): su byar med do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
303b2('bum): su med cing gnyis su byar mang ngo // lan cig 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig
303b3('bum): pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin
303b4('bum): 'di gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar me da ngo // dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhan pa nyid kyi de bzhin gang
303b5('bum): yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rang byang chub kyi de bzhi na nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
303b6('bum): nyid de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa tha
303b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su meng cing gnyis su byar med do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
303b8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i de bzhin 'di gang yin pa dang
304a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin 'di gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// phyir mi 'ong
304a2('bum): ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin 'di gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dgra bcom
304a3('bum): pa'i de bzhin 'di gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar mang ngo // rang sangs rgyas
304a4('bum): kyi de bzhin 'di gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcag pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar meng ngo // byang
304a5('bum): chung sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pathams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin 'di gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su
304a6('bum): byar med do// sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ ga'inyi su med cing gnyis su byar
304a7('bum): mang de zhes stong pa ni 'di lnga ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zab cing balnga dka' la khong du chud par dka' zhing brdag du ma mchis la rdog ge'i
304a8('bum): spyod yul ma lags pa ste/ zhi zhing phra ba zhib mo mkhas shing rtogs pas rig par bgyi ba ste/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
304b1('bum): 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag/ gzugs 'a rnam pa
304b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes
304b3('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam
304b4('bum): par shes pa 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa tha mas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mig 'i nga rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
304b5('bum): pa nyid kyang mig go// rna ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
304b6('bum): cang mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'o// lce nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'o// lus 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
304b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus so// yid nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
304b8('bum): cang mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgra'o// dri nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams cad
305a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang dri'o// ro nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
305a2('bum): ro'o// reg nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg go// chos nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
305a3('bum): kyang chos so// mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes
305a4('bum): pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par she sa pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams
305a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna 'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad ma/ 
305a6('bum): pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par
305a7('bum): shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
305a8('bum): cang mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus
305b1('bum): reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
305b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi
305b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
305b4('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi ga gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad
305b5('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te/ rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
305b6('bum): steng rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
305b7('bum): pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi
305b8('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
306a1('bum): gyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so// chu'i khams nyid rnam pa thams
306a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so// me'i khams nyid rnam pa thams rang mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa nyid kyang me'i khams so// rlung
306a3('bum): ge khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// na mkha'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
306a4('bum): pa nyid kyang na mkha'i khams so// rnam par shes pa'i kham sa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cang mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i kham so// ma rig
306a5('bum): pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
306a6('bum): kyang 'du bang ngo // rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// ming dang gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
306a7('bum): ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so// skye mched drug nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go// reg pa nyid rnam
306a8('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'ad kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa nyid rnam pa
306b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sred pa'o// len pa nyid rnam pa thams cad pakhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang len pa'o// srid pa nyid rnam pa
306b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi nyid rnam pa
306b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rga shi'o// sprin po'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
306b4('bum): phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha ral tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa tha mas cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bzod pa
306b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa tha
306b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
306b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
306b8('bum): pa'o// nang stong pa 'di rab pa thams cad b.len pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad b.len pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
307a1('bum): nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi rang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi rang stong pa nyid do// stong
307a2('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
307a3('bum): mkhyer pa 'di kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// dor dam pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid // 'dus byas stong pa
307a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye na ba nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa ste/ 
307a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ 
307a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thog ma
307a7('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ngo // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
307a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye
307b1('bum): pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid de// rang gi mtshan nyid spong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid // mi dmigs
307b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
307b3('bum): dang mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos pa med pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po meng pa
307b4('bum): ngo bo 'di stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po meng pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
307b5('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams rang mkhyen pa 'ang kyang dra pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad pa byed pa ste/ rnam pa thams cang mkhyen
307b6('bum): pa la kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cadapakhyen pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// da
307b7('bum): po 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam po thams rang mkhyen pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// sdebs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stobs
307b8('bum): rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid
308a1('bum): baM thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnab pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa 'di rnam pa
308a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnabs so// bsam gtan zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
308a3('bum): bsam gangar rnams so// tshad med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam
308a4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams rang mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs meng pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa ste/ rnam pa thams
308a5('bum): khyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnam so// mthar gyis gan pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa sde/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mthar gyis
308a6('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / spen pa meng pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
308a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa 'ad kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// mngon par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
308a8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// ting nge 'dzin nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so// gzungs kyi sgo 'ang dam pa
308b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
308b2('bum): pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// mi 'jigs pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnamaso// so so yang dag
308b3('bum): par rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// byams pa chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
308b4('bum): pa thams rang bakhyer pa nyid kyang bams pa chen po'o// snying rje chen po 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang snying rje chemapo'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
308b5('bum): 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
308b6('bum): byin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de
308b7('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid
308b8('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med zhing gnyis su byar med do// 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams dang mkhyen pa'i shA yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis sum
309a1('bum): ring gnyis su bar meng ngo // 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
309a2('bum): de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su bar med do// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
309a3('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin 'di gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// mig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin 'di
309a4('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin ring gang
309a5('bum): yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad pakhyen pa nyid kyang
309a6('bum): yin pa de ni/ de bzhin 'di gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
309a7('bum): gang yin pa de de/ nga bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis sa med cing gnyis su byar med do// lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
309a8('bum): yin pa de ni/ de bzhin 'ad gcig pa ste/ gnyis su meng cing gnyis su byar med do// yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yi/ 
309b1('bum): pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
309b2('bum): yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
309b3('bum): yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
309b4('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// ro'i de bzhi na nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di
309b5('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med // reg gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa tham
309b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
309b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med ming gnyis byar med do// pheg ka rnam der shes pa'ang 'dzin
309b8('bum): gang len pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rna ba'i rnam par shes
310a1('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su meng ci
310a2('bum): gnyis su bar med ngo // sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su yang
310a3('bum): cing gnyi su byar mang ngo // lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su mang
310a4('bum): gnyis su byar meng ngo // lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nying gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su mang
310a5('bum): cing gnyis su byar med do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid
310a6('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nying gang yin pa
310a7('bum): de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thabs cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
310a8('bum): de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
310b1('bum): pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med // lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
310b2('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar pad de// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
310b3('bum): bzhin 'di gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
310b4('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su meng cing gnyis su byar meng ngo // mig gi 'a dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yir
310b5('bum): ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ga nga yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su ma nga cing gnyis su byar meng ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
310b6('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byer med do// 
310b7('bum): snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su yang ring ga
310b8('bum): su byar meng ngo // lho'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis dor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin zhing gcig pas
311a1('bum): gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar medo// lus kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyi 'i ji de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
311a2('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
311a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
311a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thabs
311a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyi nga gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
311a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ba de ga na so/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa zad pa byed pa nyid kyi bzhin dgang sa
311a7('bum): no de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni// 
311a8('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin/ 
311b1('bum): bde ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad dakhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 
311b2('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid
311b3('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyis su leng cing gnyis su byar med do// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig
311b4('bum): pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// ming dang ga zugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig
311b5('bum): pa steng gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid
311b6('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / dbabazad pakhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su meng
311b7('bum): gnyis su byar med do// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar
